properties.title: SN Terrarium
properties.description: SN Terrarium (Neralu) is a 32-acre managed farmland project located in Koralparthi Village, Chikkaballapura District, Bengaluru, Karnataka. Designed for those seeking a harmonious blend of nature and sustainable living, it offers 146 self-sustained plots with organic farming and eco-friendly development. Nestled beside a serene stream and the Korlaparthi Dam, SN Terrarium provides a tranquil setting for weekend getaways, investment, or permanent retreat. Each plot comes with fruit-bearing trees, an advanced drip irrigation system, and a commitment to environmental conservation.

Additionally, assistance is available for developing cottages or leasing them for homestays, ensuring that owners can generate passive income with minimal involvement. The entire model emphasizes eco-friendly living, consistent plot appreciation, and a hassle-free, fully managed natural retreat.

properties.title: Lagom Villas
properties.description: Lagom Villas presents an exclusive opportunity to own one of just two meticulously designed 3-bedroom luxury villas in the serene village of Nachinola, Goa. Embracing the Swedish concept of 'Lagom' – meaning 'just the right amount' – these villas strike the perfect balance between opulence and mindful living. Each villa features a private swimming pool, landscaped garden, and thoughtfully designed living spaces spread across 3875 square feet of super built-up area. Located alongside a lush green forest, Lagom Villas offers tranquil forest views while being conveniently positioned just minutes from Goa's famous beaches, markets, and cultural attractions. The property comes fully furnished with premium materials, high-quality brands, and elegant interiors curated by renowned design professionals. Scheduled for completion by May 2025, Lagom Villas represents an intelligent investment in North Goa's flourishing real estate market, offering both substantial rental income potential and strong capital appreciation prospects. Whether as a personal holiday retreat or a lucrative rental property, these exclusive villas deliver the quintessential Goan lifestyle with modern luxury and thoughtful design.

location.name: Nachinola, Goa
location.description: Nachinola is an emerging gem in North Goa, offering serene living away from the tourist crowds yet conveniently located near popular beaches and attractions. This picturesque village is characterized by its lush green landscapes, traditional Goan houses, and peaceful atmosphere. Investors are increasingly drawn to Nachinola for its perfect balance of tranquility and accessibility. The area is experiencing steady property value appreciation as discerning buyers seek authentic Goan living experiences with modern comforts. Its proximity to popular destinations like Mapusa, Vagator, and Anjuna, while maintaining its unspoiled charm, makes Nachinola an ideal location for holiday homes and long-term investments.

properties.title: Villaggio UNA
properties.description: Villaggio UNA is a limited-edition Indo-Portuguese villa enclave located in the lush riverside village of Siolim, North Goa. Designed as a low-density private estate, the project consists of just 9 signature Villas, each designed with high vaulted ceilings, inner courtyards, antique wooden doors, and breezy verandahs. Inspired by old Goan mansions and built using natural materials, every villa comes with a private pool, tropical landscaping, and artisanal detailing. With sizes ranging from 3,866 to 4,552 sq.ft, these fully furnished 4BHK homes are ideal for second-home buyers, boutique homestay investors, and those seeking a high-end lifestyle retreat. Smart home automation, rental management, and on-ground services make this a plug-and-play luxury investment offering.

location.name: Siolim, Goa
location.description: Siolim is one of North Goa's most desirable second-home destinations, known for its calm environment, lush greenery, and riverside charm. The area is witnessing a steady influx of boutique real estate projects, designer cafes, and sustainable homestays. Its proximity to Morjim, Vagator, and Assagao ensures access to Goa's prime beaches and lifestyle hubs, while still retaining a peaceful, village feel. Connectivity to Mopa Airport (30 km) and Thivim railway station (17 km) enhances its appeal. Gated villas in Siolim have seen steady appreciation of 10–12% annually due to limited supply and rising high-net-worth buyer interest.

properties.title: Villaggio Felicita
properties.description: Villaggio Felicita is a curated collection of 42 fully furnished 1 BHK luxury suites located in Nerul, one of North Goa's most upscale residential and tourism zones. Designed for the modern vacation lifestyle, each suite comes with contemporary interiors, balconies, and access to premium shared amenities like a rooftop dining space, swimming pool, concierge services, and rental management. Felicita blends the privacy of ownership with the flexibility of a high-yield hospitality investment. The project caters to urban professionals, HNIs, and investors looking for a turnkey vacation home or profitable rental property in a low-maintenance setup. Located just minutes from Candolim Beach, Fort Aguada, and Goa's vibrant dining scene, Felicita is positioned as a smart choice for both self-use and income generation.

location.name: Nerul, Goa
location.description: Nerul is one of North Goa's most premium residential micromarkets, known for its lush surroundings, riverfront villas, and proximity to Candolim, Reis Magos, and Panaji. It's rapidly becoming a hotspot for boutique gated developments, especially those catering to the luxury vacation home segment. The area is well connected to the new Mopa Airport, state highways, and the main North Goa tourist belt. With increasing interest from domestic HNIs and NRI buyers, Nerul has seen consistent price appreciation and rental demand. Its strategic location allows residents and guests to enjoy peace and privacy while staying close to high-end restaurants, heritage sites, and beaches.

properties.title: Farm Meadows
properties.description: Farm Meadows by Karna Sree is a nature-integrated villa farmland development located in Chikkaballapura district near Madhugiri, just 80 minutes from Bengaluru Airport. Each 6-gunta (6,534 sq.ft) plot comes with a fully constructed 1, 2, or 3 BHK villa, combining the serenity of farm life with modern comforts. With planted sandalwood and teakwood trees, a planned ayurveda and naturopathy centre, and free access to a 15 acre resort clubhouse, it's perfect for those seeking a retirement home, a weekend retreat, or a high-yield rental property. Positioned near major highways and industrial belts, Farm Meadows also offers proximity to tourist hotspots like Madhugiri Fort and Lepakshi.

location.description: Yedakadu, also known as Edakadu, is a quaint village nestled in the Nilgiris Hills of Tamil Nadu, imately 26 kilometers from Udhagamandalam (Ooty) and 38 kilometers from Coonoor. Its well-developed civic amenities, robust public transport, and proximity to the beaches make Mapusa an excellent destination for long-term investment and holiday homes.

location.name: Chikkaballapura, KA
location.description: Chikkaballapura is emerging as a green-living destination near Bengaluru. Known for its clean air, hill views, and proximity to the Kempegowda Airport, it is a prime location for eco-conscious buyers seeking sustainable land investments, farmstays, and second homes. properties.title: Coffee Estates
properties.description: Located near Sakleshpura, the Coffee Estates in Chikkote offer an exceptional opportunity to own a coffee plantation with abundant natural beauty. This 1-acre estate is ideal for buyers looking for a peaceful investment, an eco-conscious lifestyle, or a holiday home within a productive coffee estate. The area offers stunning views, fresh air, and a unique chance to own a slice of Coorg's prized agricultural land, known for its high-quality coffee production.

properties.title: Vanasya
properties.description: Vanasya, a premium farmland development by Vibez Estates, is nestled in the serene Belagodu region of Sakleshpur. Offering spacious plots of 6,500 sq.ft and 10,000 sq.ft, this project is designed for discerning buyers looking to invest in nature-filled, eco-conscious spaces. Ideal for weekend homes, retirement plans, and sustainable living, Vanasya is perfect for individuals or families seeking an escape from city life with the potential for rental income and long-term growth.

properties.title: One with the Nature
properties.description: One with the Nature is a premium 40-acre holiday villa community nestled between the lush Malanadu region of the Western Ghats and the Maidan of Karnataka. The development seamlessly blends luxury with ecological consciousness, offering a lifestyle rooted in sustainability, rejuvenation, and natural beauty. With expansive coffee plantation gardens, seasonal swale parks, and curated outdoor amenities, One with the Nature invites residents to reconnect with nature while enjoying modern comforts.

properties.title: Living Farm
properties.description: Living Farm is a thoughtfully planned managed farmland development located in Pavagada, Karnataka, adjacent to India's largest solar plant. Spread over 11.5 acres, the project offers fertile agricultural plots with plantations of arecanut, hybrid coconut, and grafted lemon. It blends idyllic rural living with investment-grade potential, offering farm stays, a recreational lounge, and sustainable infrastructure. Designed for both personal retreat and income generation, Living Farm enables owners to engage in organic farming, cattle management, or short-term rentals. With ready registration, easy EMI plans, and comprehensive support services, it’s an ideal choice for conscious investors seeking green income and a healthier lifestyle.

location.name: Kanakapura, KA
location.description: Kanakapura, nestled on the southern fringes of Bengaluru, is rapidly transforming into a prime destination for sustainable living and managed farmlands. Surrounded by forest reserves and hillocks, the region boasts clean air, red fertile soil, and natural water bodies—making it ideal for organic farming and eco-tourism. Its proximity to Bannerghatta and the NICE Road ensures convenient access, while infrastructure upgrades and weekend travel demand from South Bengaluru are fueling real estate growth in the area. Kanakapura Road is also seeing increasing interest in low-density layouts, lifestyle farms, and retirement retreats.

properties.title: Mango Dew
properties.description: Mango Dew by Hasiru Farms is a compact and exclusive 3.5-acre managed farmland retreat designed for peaceful countryside living. With over 200 mango trees forming the core of the landscape, residents can live amidst nature while enjoying the charm of traditionally styled cottages blended with modern comforts. The gated community offers a quiet sanctuary near Bengaluru with essential amenities and lush green views, ideal for weekend getaways or a slower pace of life rooted in sustainability.

location.name: Ramanagara, KA
location.description: Ramanagara, known as the "Land of Seven Hills," is a fast-emerging micromarket for sustainable farmland living. Located just off the Bengaluru–Mysuru corridor, this region is dotted with mango orchards, granite hills, and serene valleys, making it ideal for curated eco-retreats like Mango Dew. The area enjoys excellent connectivity via the Bengaluru-Mysuru Expressway and Kanakapura Road, while retaining a peaceful, rural charm. With rising interest from weekend travelers, nature enthusiasts, and investors, Ramanagara offers the perfect balance between proximity to Bengaluru and the tranquility of countryside life.

properties.title: Brindavan
properties.description: Brindavan by Hasiru Farms is a 30-acre nature-focused managed farmland sanctuary that blends spiritual peace with ecological consciousness. Inspired by the tranquil essence of Lord Krishna's Vrindavan, this gated community is nestled near the sacred Kabbalamma Temple. With fully grown plantations, a dedicated cow sanctuary (Gaushala), and modern yet serene amenities, Brindavan offers an enriching lifestyle for those seeking soulful retreats and sustainable farm living near Bengaluru.

location.name: Sathanur, KA
location.description: Sathanur, located in the Ramanagara district, is an emerging micromarket known for its spiritual significance, natural landscapes, and easy connectivity to South Bengaluru. The area is blessed with red fertile soil, undulating terrain, and a peaceful rural character that makes it ideal for managed farmlands, weekend retreats, and spiritual living. Sathanur benefits from its close proximity to the revered Kabbalamma Temple and is seeing increased investor interest for eco-living and low-density farmland communities. Its location along Kanakapura Road ensures smooth access to city conveniences while offering a deeply immersive natural experience.

properties.title: SilverWood Farms
properties.description: SilverWoods by Sanjeevani Farms is a serene managed farmland development in Denkanikottai, Tamil Nadu. Focused on affordability and sustainability, the project promotes responsible land management through long-term agroforestry, eco-farming, and water conservation. Built around a philosophy of harmony between agriculture and the ecosystem, SilverWoods employs agri-tech to grow vegetables and maintain biodiversity while offering city dwellers a chance to invest in and reconnect with nature.

location.name: Santhanapalli, KA
location.description: Santhanapalli, located near Denkanikottai in Tamil Nadu's Krishnagiri district, is an emerging micromarket for eco-conscious and managed farmland investments. Surrounded by forest reserves and supported by red fertile soil and a cool microclimate, Santhanapalli offers a perfect setting for sustainable agroforestry and weekend retreats. With low-density developments and limited urbanization, the area attracts Bengaluru-based buyers looking for affordable second-home and nature-aligned investment opportunities. The proximity to Hosur and South Bengaluru via well-maintained roads further enhances its appeal.

properties.title: In the Hills
properties.description: LivingWalls - In The Hills offers an exclusive opportunity to own a holiday home in the serene landscape of Chikmagalur, just 20 minutes from the town and 2 km from the state highway. The property is divided into 39 unique plots and features a beautiful natural valley with a streamlet, leading to a viewpoint with stunning views of the Mullayanagiri Hills. The development includes a resort-style clubhouse with a swimming pool, gym, spa, fine dining restaurant, and event spaces for up to 100 people. This eco-friendly, nature-based development is perfect for those seeking a retreat that offers luxury, tranquility, and modern amenities, all while being a smart investment.

location.name: Churchugudde-Kaval , KA
location.description: Churchugudde-Kaval is a quiet and developing locality in North Bengaluru, offering a mix of residential options, ranging from traditional homes to modern properties. It is well-connected by major roads like Dinnur Main Road, and the nearby Hebbal Railway Station provides easy access to other parts of the city. The area is close to essential amenities, including schools, hospitals, and shopping centers, making it a convenient place for families and professionals. With competitive property rates, Churchugudde-Kaval is becoming an attractive option for real estate investments.

properties.title: Tapovan Farms
properties.description: Tapovan by Sanjeevani Farms is a 90-acre exclusive managed farmland community located in Thally, near Denkanikottai. Designed as a sanctuary of simplicity, nature, and self-discovery, the project features mango orchards, timber plantations, vegetable gardens, and a 2-acre natural lake. The layout integrates meditation zones, yoga decks, zen gardens, and lakeside walkways to offer a holistic wellness experience. Ideal for urban dwellers seeking a soulful rural escape, Tapovan blends sustainable agriculture with spiritual design.

location.description: Denkanikottai is a thriving green zone in the Krishnagiri district, gaining attention for its clean climate, hilly terrain, and proximity to Bengaluru. Located just 1.5–2 hours from the city, it is ideal for buyers seeking peaceful, eco-conscious retreats. properties.title: GreenVista
properties.description: Green Vista by Sanjeevani Farms is a nature-first managed farmland project located in Santhanapalli near Denkanikottai, Tamil Nadu. This eco-conscious project offers curated farm plots with fully managed agroforestry, fruit orchards, and native plantations. Designed for those seeking sustainable land ownership, weekend retreats, or nature-aligned investments, Green Vista integrates organic practices, water conservation, and soil regeneration with a focus on building a regenerative lifestyle. Its strategic proximity to Bengaluru and Hosur makes it an ideal weekend home and income-generating farm.

properties.title: Elite Square
properties.description:
Elite Square is a premium residential development that blends thoughtful architecture with functional design across four well-organized blocks—A, B, C, and D. Each block comprises a mix of spacious and efficiently laid-out units, offering multiple configurations to suit varying lifestyle needs. The layout ensures optimal natural light and ventilation, creating a comfortable living environment.

location.name: Porvorim, Goa
location.description: Porvorim, often called Goa’s "upmarket suburb," is a prime residential and commercial hub connecting Panjim and North Goa beaches. With excellent social infrastructure, including top schools, malls, hospitals, and proximity to NH 66, Porvorim is one of the most sought-after locations for urban living in Goa. It offers a blend of peaceful residential neighborhoods and vibrant commercial spaces, making it ideal for both end-users and investors.

properties.title: Acqua Eden
properties.description: Acqua Eden is a luxurious residential project located on the pristine coastline of Goa, offering a mix of sea-facing villas and studio apartments. Designed to provide an indulgent living experience, the project seamlessly blends contemporary architecture with natural surroundings. Each villa and apartment boasts panoramic ocean views, private pools, and top-of-the-line amenities, making it an ideal retreat for both relaxation and high-end living. Residents can enjoy a private, tranquil environment while having access to premium facilities like an infinity pool, gym, and a 5-star managed clubhouse. Acqua Eden is perfect for second-home buyers, retirees, and investors looking for a high-return property in one of India's most desirable locations.

properties.title: Terreno
properties.description: Terreno Villas by Adhitrum is an exclusive, luxurious villa community located in the vibrant coastal town of Vagator, Goa. Designed with a deep connection to nature, these 4 BHK villas are surrounded by panoramic views of the Chapora Fort and the Arabian Sea. The villas combine traditional Indian architecture with modern luxury, featuring private pools, expansive terraces, and high-end interiors. The development is designed with eco-consciousness in mind, featuring sustainable materials like Southern Indian Granite and Red Laterite Stone. Situated just 500 meters from Vagator Beach and in proximity to famous hotspots like Anjuna and Baga Beach, Terreno Villas offers unmatched privacy, luxury, and access to Goa's vibrant lifestyle.

properties.title: Over the Rainbow
properties.description: Over the Rainbow by Total Environment is a thoughtfully designed community located at the foothills of Nandi Hills. Featuring 33 handcrafted, earth-sheltered villas under the V25 series, each home includes private gardens, natural materials, and custom design options through their eDesign platform. With Blue and Purple interior specification packages, the homes blend into the sloped terrain for uninterrupted views, privacy, and climate control. The project also ensures complete post-handover maintenance, providing a holistic lifestyle amidst nature with a sustainable touch.

location.name: Nandi Hills, KA
location.description: Nandi Hills is one of North Bengaluru's most scenic and sought-after micro markets. Known for its lush green hillscape, pleasant climate, and historic charm, it is transforming into a premium second-home and luxury villa destination. Tourism inflow, natural vistas, and proximity to the airport are driving a shift from just weekend visits to full-time wellness-focused living. New infrastructure like planned resort clusters and eco-villas are pushing up land and property prices in this low-density zone.

properties.title: Acasa
properties.description: Acasa by Samava is an exquisite collection of Balinese-inspired luxury villas located in the tranquil village of Corgao, North Goa. The project blends modern architecture with traditional Balinese design, creating a sanctuary that offers both luxury and serenity. Each villa is thoughtfully designed with natural wood, bamboo, and stone, creating open, airy spaces that seamlessly blend with nature. The development features private pools, meditation pavilions, and lush gardens. Situated near pristine beaches like Arambol and Mandrem, Acasa offers the perfect retreat for investors, second-home buyers, and retirees looking for a peaceful, luxurious lifestyle while being just moments away from Goa's vibrant tourist spots.

location.name: Pernem, Goa
location.description: Pernem, located in North Goa, is fast emerging as a prime micro market driven by the launch of Mopa International Airport and upcoming infrastructure developments. Traditionally known for its quiet beaches like Arambol, Morjim, and Ashwem, Pernem is witnessing rapid transformation with new luxury resorts, holiday homes, and wellness retreats. Improved connectivity via highways and the airport is attracting both investors and second-home buyers seeking peaceful, high-growth locations

properties.title: Merak
properties.description: Merak by Samava offers an unparalleled luxury living experience on the pristine beaches of Morjim, Goa. This project consists of exquisitely designed 3 BHK villas, each offering spacious living with expansive terraces and private pools. The villas are inspired by contemporary tropical design, blending modern luxury with natural elements like wood and stone. Located just minutes from Morjim Beach, Merak offers a unique opportunity to invest in a private retreat amidst nature's beauty. With premium amenities, including a private beach access, jacuzzi, home automation, and a state-of-the-art entertainment system, Merak ensures that every resident can enjoy their sanctuary with comfort and style. Perfect for second-home buyers, retirees, and investors, Merak combines tranquility with luxury living in one of Goa's most sought-after locales.

location.name: Morjim, Goa
location.description: Morjim, located in North Goa, is a peaceful coastal village known for its natural beauty and serene beaches. The region has become a favorite destination for tourists, second-home buyers, and investors. Proximity to major beaches like Ashwem and Vagator makes it a prime location for luxury living. With the development of the new Mopa International Airport, the area is poised for significant growth in tourism and real estate investment.

properties.title: Palm Serenity
properties.description: Palm Serenity Resort & Plots is a unique luxury development located in Mysore, Karnataka, offering sustainable living combined with the charm of resort-style amenities. Spread across 8 acres, the development includes 6 acres of farm plots and 2 acres dedicated to resort amenities. Each plot comes with fruit-bearing trees and Sandalwood trees planted, offering an investment in both nature and finance. The development promotes a self-sufficient lifestyle with community-based living. Just a short drive from Mysore city, it provides an ideal retreat for those seeking tranquility, with 25+ amenities including a swimming pool, yoga pavilion, clubhouse, and more. It's an investment opportunity that grows over time, blending luxury, sustainability, and nature-based living.

location.name: Taripura, KA
location.description: Taripura, located in the outskirts of Mysore, Karnataka, offers a unique blend of serenity and connectivity. Known for its picturesque landscapes, this region is rapidly developing as a prime location for luxury living, holiday homes, and agro-tourism. Taripura enjoys proximity to Mysore city’s key commercial hubs and tourist attractions, yet offers a peaceful, nature-rich environment ideal for relaxation. The area’s growth is driven by the increasing interest in farmland investments and eco-friendly resorts, with demand for premium properties steadily increasing due to its affordable real estate prices and enhanced connectivity to Bengaluru and Mysore.

properties.title: Urvara
properties.description: Urvara by Vrddhi Farms is a nature-centric, managed farmland project located in Gundugallu Village, Chittoor, Andhra Pradesh, just 100 minutes from Bengaluru. Spanning 12 acres, this development offers 46 self-sustained plantation plots designed to nurture food forests with a variety of fruit trees, including Mango, Coconut, Jackfruit, and Sandalwood. This project offers the unique opportunity to invest in organic farming and sustainable living, allowing buyers to reconnect with nature while benefiting from the long-term appreciation of their farmland. The development includes modern amenities like solar-powered street lights, rainwater harvesting, and 24/7 security, ensuring a sustainable and secure lifestyle. With zero taxes on agricultural income, Urvara provides an opportunity for both personal use and financial growth through sustainable farming.

properties.title: Somewhere Over The Rainbow
properties.description: Somewhere Over the Rainbow offers luxury farmland living in Chikkamagaluru, Karnataka, spread across a vast 130-acre estate. The project is a retreat that combines nature, luxury, and sustainability. Designed to provide a serene living environment amidst rolling hills and whispering streams, the development offers plots ranging from 20,000 sq.ft to 60,000 sq.ft. The project focuses on eco-friendly infrastructure with features like rainwater harvesting, plantations, and drip irrigation systems. Additionally, it includes villas, clubhouse, and leisure amenities like picnic spots, nature trails, and yoga zones. This exclusive project is perfect for those looking to invest in nature-based living with high rental yields from agro-tourism and holiday homes. Somewhere Over the Rainbow is ideal for vacation homeowners, investors, and those seeking a peaceful retreat.

location.description: Denkanikottai is a thriving green zone in the Krishnagiri district, gaining attention for its clean climate, hilly terrain, and proximity to Bengaluru. Located just 1.5–2 hours from the city, it is ideal for buyers seeking peaceful, eco-conscious retreats. The area is fast becoming a hub for sustainable farmland projects and spiritual wellness destinations, making Tapovan a strategically located investment opportunity.

properties.title: Vitaura
properties.description: Vitaura by ALYF offers an exceptional living experience in South Goa, combining luxury, sustainability, and wellness. Designed to promote a healthy lifestyle, Vitaura incorporates eco-friendly practices with state-of-the-art technology, including energy-efficient systems, water conservation, and natural materials like wood and stone. Each villa is designed to create a serene, mindful atmosphere, with features like private swimming pools, wellness spaces, and vast open gardens. Located near Colva Beach, Vitaura provides easy access to Goa's best beaches while maintaining peace and privacy. Ideal for vacation homeowners, retirees, and those seeking a sustainable lifestyle, Vitaura brings together modern luxury and well-being.

properties.title: Sol Reserve
properties.description: Sol Reserve is an exclusive luxury villa development nestled amidst the lush 10,000 sqm dense forest in Pilerne, North Goa. The project features 16 ultra-luxurious 4 BHK villas designed to offer utmost privacy, with each villa boasting a private entry/exit, private pool, and private garden. These villas, ranging from 300 sqm to 450 sqm, are designed by international architects to deliver a perfect blend of contemporary aesthetics and traditional Goan culture. Surrounded by nature, the villas offer expansive views of the forest, creating an ideal escape with all modern conveniences. The development is strategically located close to Reis Magos Beach and the Goa International Airport, ensuring easy access to both peaceful living and urban connectivity. Sol Reserve offers the best of both worlds, combining luxury, privacy, and Goa's scenic beauty.

location.name: Pilerne, Goa
location.description: Pilerne, located in North Goa, is a rapidly growing micromarket characterized by its lush green landscapes and proximity to Goa's most popular beaches like Candolim and Anjuna. The area offers a peaceful and natural environment while being just a short drive away from urban amenities such as schools, hospitals, and malls. properties.title: Casa Havana
properties.description: Casa Havana by Zaramount is an exclusive collection of 6 luxurious villas located in the serene village of Moira, North Goa. These villas are inspired by the iconic lifestyle of cigars, symbolizing opulence and prestige. Each villa combines neo-Portuguese architecture with modern luxury, offering expansive living spaces, private pools, and serene views of the surrounding landscape. The villas are designed for those who seek ultimate privacy and exclusivity while being in close proximity to Goa's vibrant cultural and tourist destinations. With a focus on sustainable practices, the project promises a unique lifestyle experience with state-of-the-art amenities, such as a Zen courtyard, private car parks, and a wellness center.

properties.title: Casa vino
properties.description: Casa Vino by Zaramount offers an opulent lifestyle with its 5 luxury villas situated in the peaceful village of Nachinola, North Goa. Each villa is uniquely inspired by a variety of fine wines, offering a blend of modern luxury and Goan charm. Spanning 6000+ sq.ft, these spacious 4 BHK villas provide expansive living areas, private pools, and stunning landscaped gardens. Designed to evoke the rich culture and allure of fine wines, the villas feature modern amenities like a private wine cellar, modular kitchens, and open terraces. The property is surrounded by lush greenery, offering serene views while remaining close to key destinations in Goa. Ideal for second-home buyers, retirees, and investors, Casa Vino is a symbol of elegance and exclusivity.

properties.title: The Secret Lake
properties.description: The Secret Lake is a luxury plot and lakefront villa project located in the peaceful and scenic town of Nelamangala, Karnataka. Spanning across 20 exclusive plots, the development offers a serene and high-end living experience for those seeking luxury and tranquility amidst nature. Each plot ranges from 6000 sq.ft and is designed to blend seamlessly with the surrounding lake and natural beauty. With community-centric design and sustainable architecture, the project incorporates shared spaces, organic gardens, and climate-responsive buildings. The clubhouse, with a rooftop restaurant offering lake views and an outdoor amphitheater, provides opportunities for both community building and luxurious relaxation. This project offers an exclusive living experience with strong rental income potential due to its proximity to the lake and beautiful landscape. The Secret Lake is ideal for vacation homeowners, investors, and those seeking a peaceful retreat.

location.name: Hoskote, KA
location.description: Hoskote is a rapidly developing town located in the northeast of Bengaluru, with proximity to both IT hubs and industrial zones like Devanahalli and Malur. With the Bengaluru-Chennai expressway and upcoming metro connectivity, the area is becoming a prime residential and industrial hub. The location offers tranquility while ensuring connectivity to the city's key areas, making it ideal for sustainable living and agricultural investments.

properties.title: The Skye Grove
properties.description: The Skye Grove offers an unparalleled living experience with luxury condominiums located in Reis Magos, North Goa, on the banks of the Mandovi River. This iconic project comprises three distinct condominium blocks: Tierra, Agua, and Viento, each offering modern 3 BHK units and 1 BHK studio units designed with the finest materials. The project is designed to create a luxurious and serene living experience, featuring amenities like a rooftop infinity-edge pool, gym, and a rooftop restaurant with panoramic views. Located just minutes away from the vibrant areas of Panaji and Aguada Fort, The Skye Grove offers the perfect combination of luxury, natural beauty, and connectivity.

location.name: Reis Magos, Goa
location.description: Reis Magos is a charming area in North Goa with proximity to Panaji, Aguada Fort, and several pristine beaches. It's an increasingly sought-after location for premium real estate due to its scenic views, tranquil environment, and access to Goa's vibrant city life. The Skye Grove offers the perfect balance of serenity and connectivity to Goa's thriving urban center.

properties.title: The Green Grove
properties.description: The Green Grove is an exclusive luxury villa community located in Moira-Nachinola, North Goa, designed for those seeking peace, luxury, and sustainability. The project consists of 8 opulent villas, each featuring spacious living areas with an emphasis on eco-friendly materials and modern technology. The villas are designed to offer both luxury and sustainability, featuring natural finishes, large windows, and outdoor spaces that connect residents with the beauty of Goa's countryside. These homes also feature green roofs, a private garden, and private pools. Nestled in a picturesque landscape of fields, hills, and natural water bodies, The Green Grove offers a retreat-style lifestyle with proximity to Goa's beaches and cultural landmarks.

location.name: Moira, Goa
location.description: Moira is a quiet village located in North Goa, offering a peaceful environment while still being close to the bustling tourist destinations of Anjuna and Calangute. The region is increasingly attracting those looking for luxury villas and second homes due to its serene charm and proximity to Goa's beautiful beaches and cultural hotspots.

properties.title: Kasauli Paraiso
properties.description: Kasauli Paraiso is a luxurious retreat nestled in the prestigious hills of Kasauli, Himachal Pradesh. Located at an altitude of 6,000 feet, the project offers unparalleled views of the surrounding hills and valleys, providing an ultimate paradise experience. The development consists of meticulously designed luxury villas and apartments, ensuring the perfect balance of comfort, style, and natural beauty. With spacious living areas, expansive balconies, and top-notch amenities, Kasauli Paraiso caters to those who seek tranquility, luxury, and a connection to nature. The serene environment and cool climate make it an ideal second home or investment opportunity.

properties.title: Mashobra Hills

Each home offers panoramic views of the surrounding cedar forests, snow-capped peaks, and deep valleys, making it an ideal retreat for vacationers, remote professionals, or long-term investors in the hill-state.

location.description: Shimla is one of Himachal Pradesh’s most prominent real estate micromarkets, offering a blend of scenic beauty, colonial charm, and robust infrastructure. properties.title: Residency Himalayas
properties.description: Residency Himalayas is a premium ready-to-move residential development located just 10 minutes from Mall Road, Shimla. Offering fully furnished apartments, duplexes, and penthouses with spectacular views of Mashobra and Naldehra valleys, the project caters to retirees, vacation home buyers, and investors seeking a luxury foothold in the Himalayas. Each home is thoughtfully designed for comfort and functionality, with curated interiors and senior-friendly amenities. Non-Himachalis can legally purchase here, offering rare second home ownership in Shimla.

location.name: Aldona, Goa
location.description: Aldona is one of Goa's most serene and culturally rich inland villages, often referred to as the "most beautiful village in Goa." Nestled between green valleys and rivers, it is known for its peaceful living, heritage homes, and proximity to Mapusa and Assagao. Demand for luxury villas here is rising among NRIs, creatives, and wellness seekers due to its exclusivity and old-world charm.

These homes are designed as both tranquil retreats and investment-ready assets, situated minutes from Candolim, Nerul River, and Goa's nightlife circuit.

location.name: Saipem, Goa
location.description: Saipem is one of North Goa’s most exclusive and tranquil residential pockets, located just minutes from Candolim and the Nerul River. Nestled in a lush, elevated valley, Saipem has quickly become a preferred destination for luxury villa developments and high-net-worth buyers seeking privacy with proximity. Its scenic topography—marked by hills, dense greenery, and water views—offers a unique blend of serenity and accessibility. Unlike the tourist-heavy belts, Saipem offers low-density gated projects with premium pricing and tight inventory. With quick access to NH 66, Candolim beach, and top dining destinations, this micromarket has witnessed a surge in boutique developments. It's especially favored by NRIs, Bollywood celebrities, and digital entrepreneurs looking to invest in Goa’s quieter, more refined side. Property values here have appreciated steadily over the past 3–5 years, with many projects fully booked during pre-launch phases.

properties.title: Villamor Facade
properties.description: Villamor by ALYF is an exclusive collection of eight luxury villas perched on a verdant hill in Socorro, North Goa. Each 3.5 BHK villa spans a built-up area of 2,800 square feet on a plot of 2,407 square feet, offering residents a harmonious blend of refined luxury and natural beauty. Designed with meticulous attention to detail, these residences feature private swimming pools, alfresco decks, landscaped gardens, and luxe interiors, creating an intimate retreat within a private oasis. The villas are thoughtfully crafted to provide an unparalleled living experience, seamlessly integrating opulence with the art of living.

location.name: Socorro , Goa
location.description: Socorro is one of North Goa's most sought-after luxury home markets, positioned between the cultural centers of Panaji and Mapusa. It's surrounded by green hills, heritage churches, and premium residential enclaves. The area is ideal for buyers seeking tranquility while being minutes away from Goa's retail, dining, and entertainment hubs. Demand for gated villas with premium amenities is on the rise, and inventory remains tight due to strict land norms.

properties.title: Hillsong Coffee Estate
properties.description: HillSong Coffee Estate offers an exclusive opportunity for investors to participate in sustainable farming through a managed coffee estate in Sakleshpur, Karnataka. Located in the Western Ghats, the estate is designed to provide steady returns from coffee, pepper, cocoa, and areca nut cultivation. Each plot is meticulously managed, ensuring sustainable and profitable growth with minimal investor involvement. The estate is designed to support organic farming practices, contributing to eco-friendly agriculture while offering high-value crops. HillSong promises excellent returns over the years, with a 70% investor share, providing long-term financial growth through the expansion of the estate's yields.

properties.title: Colina Meadows
properties.description: Colina Meadows offers an exclusive living experience nestled amidst the rolling hills of Gumlapuram, Tamil Nadu. This luxurious 25-acre gated community consists of 70 limited-edition hilltop plots, each ranging from 5,000 sq.ft to 10,000 sq.ft. Designed for those seeking a serene and sophisticated lifestyle, Colina Meadows offers panoramic views of the surrounding mountains, lush green landscapes, and an abundance of natural beauty. The development features world-class amenities such as a 35,000 sq.ft clubhouse, infinity pool, mini golf course, scenic walking tracks, and multipurpose lawns, making it an ideal choice for nature lovers who want to combine luxury with tranquility. With eco-conscious features like bio-septic tanks, decentralized waste management, and sustainable water systems, Colina Meadows is an attractive destination for investors and homeowners alike.

properties.title: Sirivana
properties.description: Vibez Sirivana is an exclusive residential plot project located amidst the rolling hills and lush greenery of Chikkaballapur, Bengaluru. The project spans 25  acres planned plots ranging in size from half acre to 1 acre. Designed for those who seek a peaceful and eco-friendly lifestyle, Vibez Sirivana blends urban convenience with the beauty of nature, featuring amenities such as rainwater harvesting, avenue tree plantations, and green spaces. The project is an ideal destination for those looking for luxury farmland and residential properties, offering both modern living and proximity to Bengaluru's key commercial areas. With its commitment to sustainable living, Vibez Sirivana stands out as a top investment opportunity.

location.name: Varca, Goa
location.description: Varca is a peaceful and picturesque beachside town in South Goa, known for its pristine beaches, tranquil environment, and high-end resorts. The region is becoming a popular location for luxury vacation homes, and real estate investments, with increasing demand for high-end properties offering access to nature and Goa's vibrant tourism. Its proximity to Benaulim Beach, Carmona Beach, and Panjim City makes it a highly desirable location.

properties.title: Rumah Desa
properties.description: Rumah Desa is a private enclave of 3 and 4 BHK Balinese-style luxury villas set in the serene landscape of Siolim, North Goa. Designed with tropical sensibilities and functional elegance, these villas offer private pools, sunken terraces, rooftop decks, and lush courtyards. Each villa is fully furnished and tailored for high-end living or short-stay rental appeal. Located close to Vagator, Morjim, and Assagao, Rumah Desa offers a premium lifestyle just minutes from Goa's cultural and leisure hubs.

location.name: Siolim, Goa
location.description: Siolim is one of North Goa's most desirable second-home destinations, known for its calm environment, lush greenery, and riverside charm. The area is witnessing a steady influx of boutique real estate projects, designer cafes, and sustainable homestays. Its proximity to Morjim, Vagator, and Assagao ensures access to Goa's prime beaches and lifestyle hubs, while still retaining a peaceful, village feel. Connectivity to Mopa Airport (30 km) and Thivim railway station (17 km) enhances its appeal. Gated villas in Siolim have seen steady appreciation of 10–12% annually due to limited supply and rising high-net-worth buyer interest.

properties.title: The Crest
properties.description: The Crest by Unwinding Homes is an ultra-luxury residential project located in the green valley of Pilerne, North Goa. Designed as independent sky villas, each unit offers a private infinity pool, expansive balconies, and large open-plan interiors. With fully furnished homes, top-end materials, and an uninterrupted view of lush forested hills, The Crest offers the perfect blend of tranquility and high-end design. The project is ideal for discerning homebuyers looking for a luxury retreat or high-yielding rental property.

location.name: Pilerne, Goa
location.description: Pilerne, located in North Goa, is a rapidly growing micromarket characterized by its lush green landscapes and proximity to Goa's most popular beaches like Candolim and Anjuna. The area offers a peaceful and natural environment while being just a short drive away from urban amenities such as schools, hospitals, and malls. The growing demand for luxury villas, holiday homes, and eco-resorts makes Pilerne an attractive location for real estate investment.

With full furnishing, smart home automation, and seamless indoor-outdoor transitions, Villa Raio is ideal as a private retreat or high-yielding holiday rental in Goa's most desirable belt.

location.name: Parra , Goa
location.description: Parra, located in North Goa, offers an ideal combination of tranquility and easy access to the bustling areas of Candolim, Anjuna, and Baga Beach. location.name: Saipem, Goa
location.description: Saipem is one of North Goa’s most exclusive and tranquil residential pockets, located just minutes from Candolim and the Nerul River. Nestled in a lush, elevated valley, Saipem has quickly become a preferred destination for luxury villa developments and high-net-worth buyers seeking privacy with proximity. Its scenic topography—marked by hills, dense greenery, and water views—offers a unique blend of serenity and accessibility. Unlike the tourist-heavy belts, Saipem offers low-density gated projects with premium pricing and tight inventory. With quick access to NH 66, Candolim beach, and top dining destinations, this micromarket has witnessed a surge in boutique developments. It's especially favored by NRIs, Bollywood celebrities, and digital entrepreneurs looking to invest in Goa’s quieter, more refined side. Property values here have appreciated steadily over the past 3–5 years, with many projects fully booked during pre-launch phases.

properties.title: Banyan Grove Villa
properties.description: The Barefoot Garden Villa is a Balinese-style luxury 5 BHK villa in the serene locale of Marra, Goa. Thoughtfully crafted to create harmony between indoor elegance and lush outdoor landscapes, the villa boasts high-pitched ceilings, stone finishes, and tropical design elements. With expansive open spaces, floor-to-ceiling glass panels, and a seamless blend of modern luxury and natural tranquility, it serves as a perfect holiday retreat or investment property in North Goa's most upscale micro-market.

location.name: Moira, Goa
location.description: Moira is a quiet village located in North Goa, offering a peaceful environment while still being close to the bustling tourist destinations of Anjuna and Calangute. The region is increasingly attracting those looking for luxury villas and second homes due to its serene charm and proximity to Goa's beautiful beaches and cultural hotspots.

properties.title: Villaggio Hyderabad
properties.description: Villaggio Hyderabad is a meticulously planned 175-acre managed farmland located in the serene locales of Mokila-Shankarpalli, Hyderabad. The project offers spacious farmland plots designed for those seeking a combination of luxury, sustainability, and nature-friendly living. Each plot, starting from 4,000 sq. yards, is ideal for creating your own organic farming, fruit orchards, or a personal retreat. The project emphasizes eco-friendly infrastructure with features like rainwater harvesting, drip irrigation, and wastewater recycling. In addition, premium leisure amenities such as swimming pools, wellness areas, yoga huts, and fishing ponds enhance the living experience. This development is perfect for those seeking a luxury lifestyle while maintaining a connection to nature and sustainability.

location.name: Mokila-Shankarpalli, Hyderabad, TL
location.description: Mokila-Shankarpalli has emerged as one of the most sought-after locations for farmland investments and second homes near Hyderabad. Known for its serene environment, low population density, and proximity to the Financial District, this micromarket is rapidly developing into an attractive investment hub with increasing real estate demand. The region's low pollution levels, scenic landscapes, and growing infrastructure make it an ideal location for luxury living and agro-tourism investments.

properties.title: Silpa Raghava Botanica
properties.description: Silpa Raghava Botanica is a 331-acre premium integrated township near Srisailam Highway, adjacent to the upcoming Hyderabad Pharma City. With 1,417 HMDA and RERA-approved villa plots, the township is built around sustainable design and high-end living. It includes a 40,000 sq.ft. clubhouse and over 100 luxury amenities such as a Miyawaki Forest, Biophilic Gardens, sports courts, wellness centers, and eco-conscious infrastructure. Botanica brings together modern living and natural serenity in one of Hyderabad's most promising growth corridors.

location.name: Kandukur, TL
location.description: Kandukur, located along the Srisailam Highway in the southern corridor of Hyderabad, is rapidly emerging as a prime residential and investment destination. Its proximity to the multi-billion-dollar Hyderabad Pharma City, India’s largest life sciences industrial cluster, drives strong demand for plotted and integrated township developments. The area is characterized by improved infrastructure, wide roads, and planned commercial zones, making it attractive for investors seeking high appreciation and connectivity. With easy access to Rajiv Gandhi International Airport and the Outer Ring Road (ORR), Kandukur balances future potential with affordable entry points in Hyderabad’s fast-growing landscape.

properties.title: Silpa Whistling Woods
properties.description: Silpa Whistling Woods is a nature-immersive wellness-focused farmland and villa community near Shamirpet, Hyderabad. Spread across 118 acres with scenic landscaping, fruit plantations, and a state-of-the-art wellness resort, the project aims to provide a peaceful living experience fused with luxury. It features a clubhouse, spa, water bodies, organic gardens, and wide roads—all located within easy reach of Genome Valley, ORR, and Hyderabad's northern growth corridor.

location.name: Shamirpet, TL
location.description: Shamirpet is emerging as one of Hyderabad's most desirable suburban retreats. Known for its clean air, proximity to Genome Valley, and tranquil green cover, it is ideal for wellness-focused real estate. With strong road access via ORR and rapid infrastructural growth, Shamirpet offers a blend of urban connectivity and rural serenity. The area hosts numerous resorts, educational institutions, and biotech campuses, making it attractive for both leisure and long-term lifestyle investments. Demand for plotted developments and gated weekend communities continues to grow, backed by consistent real estate appreciation and rental returns.

properties.title: Sapling
properties.description: Sapling by SAIBYA offers an exclusive opportunity to own luxury farm plots in Doddaballapur, just a short distance from the serene Nandi Hills. The project spans across 14.33 acres and includes 54 limited edition farm plots, each ranging from 6,000 sq.ft upwards. Designed for those seeking an escape into nature, these plots offer private gardens, amazing views of Nandi Hills, and access to premium community amenities. The development also features high-end infrastructure such as yoga zones, sports courts, and a clubhouse, ensuring a peaceful yet luxurious living experience. This project is ideal for those looking for weekend homes, agro-tourism, or a relaxing retreat while enjoying easy access to Bengaluru's urban conveniences.

location.name: Kollur , TL
location.description: Kollur is a fast-emerging micro-market in western Hyderabad, strategically located along the Outer Ring Road (ORR) with excellent connectivity to major IT hubs like Financial District, Gachibowli, and HITEC City. Known for its affordability compared to neighboring areas like Tellapur and Nallagandla, Kollur is gaining traction among mid-income homebuyers, IT professionals, and long-term investors. Social infrastructure is also improving with the presence of reputed schools like Samashti International and growing healthcare and retail options.

properties.title: Riverscape
properties.description: Riverscape is a premium villa development located in Bandlaguda Jagir, Hyderabad, spanning across 22.5 acres. The project consists of 226 luxury villas, each designed to blend luxury with nature, offering an exceptional riverside living experience. Each villa features heightened ceilings, 30% glass coverage to maximize natural light, and private lift provisions, ensuring an elegant and comfortable lifestyle. The open architecture and lush green surroundings make Riverscape a sanctuary for residents, offering a balance of luxury and tranquility. The project is located near Osman Sagar and Mrugavani National Park, ensuring a peaceful environment while providing easy access to key city attractions, making it an ideal investment opportunity for those seeking a serene yet connected lifestyle.

location.name: Karjat, MH
location.description: Karjat is emerging as one of Maharashtra’s top second-home destinations thanks to its lush landscape, cooler climate, and proximity to both Mumbai and Pune. With planned infrastructure upgrades like the Karjat-Panvel railway extension and the proposed Mumbai Trans Harbour Link (MTHL), accessibility is improving. properties.title: Forest By The Hills - Karjat
properties.description: Forest by the Hills is a luxury farmland and eco-resort project located in the serene landscapes of Karjat, Maharashtra. Spanning across 300 acres of lush greenery, the project offers managed farmland plots starting from 1 acre, featuring native flora, streams, and waterfalls. With a focus on eco-friendly infrastructure, Forest by the Hills promises a sustainable living experience amidst nature. The development also features gated community living with clear titles, borewell water, and landscaping for each plot. The unique blend of luxury and nature makes it a perfect investment for those seeking a retreat home or holiday home while preserving the sanctity of nature. The project also benefits from growing demand for agro-tourism and luxury vacation homes in Karjat, providing high rental income and capital appreciation.

location.name: Siolim, Goa
location.description: Siolim is one of North Goa's most desirable second-home destinations, known for its calm environment, lush greenery, and riverside charm. The area is witnessing a steady influx of boutique real estate projects, designer cafes, and sustainable homestays. Its proximity to Morjim, Vagator, and Assagao ensures access to Goa's prime beaches and lifestyle hubs, while still retaining a peaceful, village feel. Connectivity to Mopa Airport (30 km) and Thivim railway station (17 km) enhances its appeal. Gated villas in Siolim have seen steady appreciation of 10–12% annually due to limited supply and rising high-net-worth buyer interest.

properties.title: The Elements
properties.description: The Elements is a collection of luxury villas located in Nachinola, North Goa, an exclusive residential destination offering a peaceful yet connected lifestyle. The development features fully furnished 5 BHK villas with spacious living areas, private pools, and expansive terraces. The villas, ranging from 3,500 sq.ft, combine modern living with traditional Goan elements, offering an elegant design, high-end specifications like modular kitchens, Daikin air conditioning, and Italian marble flooring. The villas are designed to offer complete privacy, luxury, and comfort, making them ideal for both holiday homeowners and investors. With close proximity to Candolim Beach, Anjuna Beach, and Panjim, The Elements provides a premium lifestyle in one of the most sought-after destinations in Goa.

location.name: Roha, MH
location.description: Roha,is an emerging market offering a blend of natural beauty and growing infrastructure. Positioned along the Mumbai–Goa highway and a key rail line, it enjoys strong connectivity and is seeing increasing interest for plotted developments, second homes, and agro-tourism projects. With upcoming industrial zones, large-scale employment hubs, and affordable land rates, Roha presents a high-potential opportunity for early-stage investment in a nature-rich, well-connected setting.

properties.title: Trulife
properties.description: Trulife Karjat is an exclusive gated community located in the serene hills of Karjat, Maharashtra. This luxury villa project is set on 10 acres of picturesque land, offering 110 villas with 2BHK, 3BHK, and 4BHK configurations. Designed with a nature-inspired theme, the development includes features like private gardens, swimming pools, and eco-friendly infrastructure. The villas are fully customizable, with options for adding plunge pools, glasshouses, and gazebos to match individual preferences. Additionally, the upcoming 4-star resort within the community will offer luxurious accommodations and leisure amenities. Trulife Karjat presents a unique opportunity for luxury living, with high rental income potential from its resort-style amenities and proximity to Mumbai and Navi Mumbai.

location.name: Karjat, MH
location.description: Karjat is emerging as one of Maharashtra’s top second-home destinations thanks to its lush landscape, cooler climate, and proximity to both Mumbai and Pune. With planned infrastructure upgrades like the Karjat-Panvel railway extension and the proposed Mumbai Trans Harbour Link (MTHL), accessibility is improving. A thriving tourism ecosystem, combined with real estate interest in luxury villas, eco-resorts, and weekend homes, continues to push demand and property appreciation in this micromarket.

properties.title: Rivermist
properties.description:
Rivermist is an idyllic luxury farmhouse community located in the peaceful village of Waghoshi, Lonavala — just a 2.5-hour drive from Mumbai. Spread across 150 acres of lush, scenic terrain, Rivermist offers expansive N.A. (non-agricultural) farmhouse plots starting from 1/2 acre, surrounded by mountains, river streams, and forested beauty. Developed by Mohite Real Estate, the project is designed for individuals seeking a private retreat in nature without compromising on modern.
The gated community features amenities like a clubhouse, swimming pool, children’s play area, yoga and meditation deck, sports courts, and gazebos. It’s not just a land investment—it’s a lifestyle offering tranquility, investment potential, and weekend luxury living.

location.name: Waghoshi, MH
location.description: Waghoshi, located in the Sudhagad region of Raigad, is a quiet rural micro-market surrounded by greenery and hills, making it ideal for nature-led developments. With proximity to Khopoli, Pali, and the growing Karjat–Alibag corridor, it offers early-stage investment potential for plotted layouts, weekend homes, and agro-retreats. Its serene setting, improving road access, and low entry cost position Waghoshi as a promising destination for long-term lifestyle real estate.

properties.title: Mumbai Collective
properties.description: The Mumbai Collective by Beforest is a regenerative, eco-conscious private estate project located in Khopoli near Lonavala, Maharashtra. Blending sustainable design, permaculture, and collective living principles, each estate offers a 3 acre private zone and 1000 sq. yards earmarked for your home and leases the rest of the land to Beforest for ecological restoration and community farming. With a focus on zero-waste infrastructure, food forests, water stewardship, and integrated architecture, this project is ideal for conscious investors and second-home buyers seeking a back-to-nature lifestyle without compromising on comfort.

location.name: Khopoli, MH
location.description: Khopoli is a developing hill station gateway with growing eco-tourism potential. Located at the foothills of the Sahyadri range, it offers excellent connectivity to both Mumbai and Pune while maintaining a natural ambiance ideal for sustainable farm estates and weekend homes.

properties.title: Hammiyala Collective
properties.description: Hammiyala by Beforest is a first-of-its-kind collective ownership model set on a 100 + acre coffee estate in Madhopura, Coorg. The project allows like-minded individuals to co-own a piece of this vast landscape, managed through a community governance model. The estate is transitioning into a thriving food forest using permaculture practices—integrating coffee, native trees, spices, and medicinal herbs. With an emphasis on biodiversity, zero-waste living, and water conservation, Co-Forest represents the new wave of regenerative living without the need for private construction or villa ownership.

properties.title: Poomaale 2.0
properties.description: Poomaale 2.0 Collective by Beforest is a 100-acre regenerative wilderness estate located near Kakkabe in Coorg, Karnataka. Building on the success of Poomaale 1.0, this project is designed as a nature-aligned community where members co-own land under a stewardship model. The estate integrates permaculture-based farming, biodiversity conservation, and low-impact living. It is a rare opportunity to live in harmony with the Western Ghats ecosystem while enjoying the comfort of private ownership and the benefit of a curated, managed community.

properties.title: Blossom Creek
properties.description: Blossom Creek by The Retreat Farms is a nature-first managed farmland community located near South Bengaluru. Designed as a sustainable retreat for urban families, the project offers curated farmland plots with optional farmhouse construction, located within a secured, eco-sensitive gated layout. With amenities like nature trails, fruit orchards, curated landscapes, and full maintenance services, Blossom Creek is ideal for buyers looking to reconnect with nature while enjoying long-term capital appreciation. Whether as a weekend escape, long-term residence, or wellness investment, the farm plots provide both ecological value and recreational living.

location.description: Kodihalli has rapidly evolved into a popular real estate corridor for eco-living and farmhouse buyers due to its green landscapes, improved road networks, and spillover demand from Bengaluru's southern suburbs. properties.title: Brindavan Estates
properties.description: Brindavan Estates by Vriksha Farms is a long-term sustainable timber investment project located just 80 km from Bengaluru, in the ecologically rich zone of Ramnagara District, Karnataka. The estate offers investors an opportunity to own managed timber farmland with guaranteed annual rental income of ₹1.75 Lakhs per acre. The project is focused on climate-resilient, low-maintenance, and high-yield forestry featuring Melia Dubia and other high-value trees. Brindavan Estates not only offers consistent returns but also enables participation in large-scale ecological restoration by promoting carbon capture, biodiversity, and oxygen generation through afforestation.

location.name: Kanakapura, KA
location.description: Kanakapura, nestled on the southern fringes of Bengaluru, is rapidly transforming into a prime destination for sustainable living and managed farmlands. Surrounded by forest reserves and hillocks, the region boasts clean air, red fertile soil, and natural water bodies—making it ideal for organic farming and eco-tourism. Its proximity to Bannerghatta and the NICE Road ensures convenient access, while infrastructure upgrades and weekend travel demand from South Bengaluru are fueling real estate growth in the area. Kanakapura Road is also seeing increasing interest in low-density layouts, lifestyle farms, and retirement retreats.

properties.title: Luxe Villas
properties.description: Ramkamal Luxe is an exclusive, self-sustainable 4 BHK villa community located in the serene and picturesque area of Akkarai, Chennai, just 1 km from the Bay of Bengal. Spanning across luxurious, eco-friendly villas, each home is designed with opulent finishes and cutting-edge technology to provide modern comfort while maintaining harmony with nature. Featuring solar-powered systems, EV-charging stations, and intelligent home automation, Ramkamal Luxe offers an elevated living experience. With beautifully landscaped surroundings, panoramic views, and a focus on sustainability, it caters to affluent buyers and investors looking for a luxurious, green lifestyle just a short drive from the city. Ideal for those who seek a peaceful coastal retreat with modern amenities, this project is a perfect blend of luxury and environmental consciousness.

properties.title: Maruthi Star City
properties.description: Maruthi Star City (MSC) is a premium 29-acre gated community villa project located in the rapidly emerging Shadnagar micromarket of Hyderabad. Comprising 362 residential villa plots, MSC offers plot sizes ranging from 165 to 560 sq. yards, catering to both investors and end-users. The project is designed to offer modern urban amenities in a peaceful and green suburban environment with 100% Vaastu-compliant layout, CC roads, underground power, sewage treatment plant (STP), and a well-planned clubhouse. MSC is strategically positioned near NH-44 and just 200 meters from the upcoming RRR, ensuring future-ready connectivity.

location.name: Shadnagar, TL
location.description: Shadnagar is a high-growth satellite township in the RR District of Hyderabad, known for its rapid development due to major government and private investments. Its strategic location along NH-44 and proximity to Rajiv Gandhi Airport, SEZs, logistics hubs, and upcoming pharma & IT corridors makes it ideal for plotted developments, holiday homes, and rental properties. Demand from NRIs, professionals, and early investors has surged due to affordable pricing and infrastructure growth.

properties.title: GT Uptown
properties.description: GT Uptown is a DTCP and RERA-approved plotted development located in Kandigai, Chennai, along the Vandalur–Kelambakkam Road. The project offers scenic mountain views, lakefront proximity, and excellent connectivity to major IT corridors and upcoming infrastructure hubs. It is ideal for both self-use and investment, catering to Chennai's rising demand for plotted land in rapidly developing suburbs.

properties.title: La Amethyst
properties.description: La Amethyst by GT Realty is a boutique, resort-style plotted development situated along the scenic East Coast Road (ECR) in Kovalam, Chennai. Spread across 1.76 acres, the project comprises just 29 exclusive villa plots, offering discerning buyers a rare opportunity to build their own beachside holiday or retirement home in a gated, serene environment. With designer compound walls, lush avenue plantations, solar lighting, and plug-and-play infrastructure already in place, La Amethyst is designed for individuals who appreciate nature, exclusivity, and proximity to Chennai’s coastal treasures. The project offers both privacy and prestige in a highly sought-after leisure corridor with excellent road connectivity and rising investment potential.

location.name: Mahabalipuram, TN
location.description: Mahabalipuram, a historic coastal town south of Chennai, is emerging as a promising real estate micro-market. Known for its UNESCO-listed monuments and strong tourism appeal, it benefits from strategic connectivity via the East Coast Road (ECR). The area is witnessing growth in hospitality, residential, and commercial developments, driven by demand for resorts, vacation homes, and plotted investments. Its blend of heritage, scenic coastline, and improving infrastructure positions Mahabalipuram as an attractive destination for real estate investors and end-users alike.

properties.title: Amoda Reserve South Park
properties.description: Amoda Reserve - South Park is a premium gated villa community set amidst the scenic green surroundings of Kunegaon, Lonavala. Designed as a nature-first development, the villas blend luxury architecture with eco-conscious design, offering private, serene living within forest surroundings. The project is located opposite Della Adventure Park and features high-end infrastructure and professional property management services. With proximity to Mumbai and Pune, South Park is the perfect blend of urban proximity and countryside retreat.

location.name: Kunegaon, MH
location.description: Kunegaon is a sought-after micro-location in Lonavala known for its high-end resorts, premium gated communities, and proximity to major attractions like Della Adventure Park. Surrounded by lush greenery and located close to the Mumbai-Pune Expressway, it is favored by HNIs and investors for vacation homes. Property appreciation and rental demand remain consistently strong in this submarket.

properties.title: Aria
properties.description: Kalpataru Aria is a nature-integrated plotted development nestled in the Sahyadri Hills of Karjat. Spread over 88 acres, it offers premium residential plots for bespoke holiday homes. Designed by Hafeez Contractor and Green Space Alliance, the project features low-density planning, green zones, and wellness-focused amenities. With world-class infrastructure and eco-sensitive landscaping, Kalpataru Aria is ideal for investors seeking a weekend retreat or a high-return real estate asset close to Mumbai and Pune.

location.name: Karjat, MH
location.description: Karjat is emerging as one of Maharashtra’s top second-home destinations thanks to its lush landscape, cooler climate, and proximity to both Mumbai and Pune. With planned infrastructure upgrades like the Karjat-Panvel railway extension and the proposed Mumbai Trans Harbour Link (MTHL), accessibility is improving. A thriving tourism ecosystem, combined with real estate interest in luxury villas, eco-resorts, and weekend homes, continues to push demand and property appreciation in this micromarket.

properties.title: Hillsyde
properties.description: Hillsyde Villa is an exclusive NA Plots community nestled in the scenic hills of Igatpuri, offering unparalleled views of nature and a luxurious living experience. Located amidst lush greenery and serene landscapes, these villas are designed to offer modern comfort while harmonizing with nature. The project features beautifully crafted villas with expansive living spaces, a private swimming pool, and luxurious interiors. Residents can enjoy world-class amenities such as a clubhouse, yoga area, and a meditation pavilion, making Hillsyde Villa the perfect getaway for relaxation and tranquility.

location.name: Igatpuri, MH
location.description: Igatpuri is a hill station located in the Western Ghats of Maharashtra, known for its scenic beauty and cool climate. With increasing tourism and demand for luxury retreats, it is becoming a prime location for real estate investment. Proximity to Nashik and Mumbai further enhances its appeal, making it an ideal destination for second homes and weekend getaways.

properties.title: Marigold villas
properties.description: Marigold Villas offers a premium residential experience in Lonavala, one of Maharashtra's most sought-after hill stations. The project features spacious 4 BHK villas, each designed to provide a perfect blend of luxury, comfort, and serenity. With its ideal location amidst lush greenery, the villas offer a peaceful retreat from the city, while providing modern amenities for a high-end lifestyle. These villas are perfect for vacation homeowners, retirees, or investors seeking a valuable asset in the rapidly growing Lonavala market.

properties.title: Estella
properties.description: Estella Villa by Vista Grande is a luxurious and exclusive 5BHK Villa located in Panchgani, Mahabaleshwar. Designed for those who value privacy, nature, and elegance, the villa features a private swimming pool, jacuzzi bathrooms, home theatre, and a basement game area. It offers expansive living and dining areas, private lawn space, and modern amenities curated for both comfort and entertainment. Ideal for high-end users seeking serene vacation living or investors exploring high-yield rentals, Estella delivers a sophisticated blend of design and utility in a picturesque location.

location.name: Panchgani, MH
location.description: Panchgani, nestled in the Sahyadri hills near Mahabaleshwar, is gaining traction as a premium real estate hub for luxury villas and vacation homes. Renowned for its colonial charm, boarding schools, and strawberry farms, Panchgani attracts both tourists and long-term second home investors seeking tranquility and scenic beauty. Its proximity to Mahabaleshwar, along with excellent road connectivity from Mumbai and Pune, enhances its appeal as a weekend retreat. As demand for boutique stays and nature-driven experiences rises, Panchgani stands out as an emerging destination for high-end holiday homes and sustainable investment opportunities.

properties.title: Vaarivana Villas
properties.description: Vaarivana is Pune's first luxury golf villa community, offering 3 BHK and 4 BHK villas nestled in a tranquil, verdant setting. The project is designed to provide modern comforts while being deeply connected to nature. Each villa is crafted to cater to the needs of modern urban dwellers, while still offering a peaceful escape from the city's noise. location.name: Urse, MH
location.description: Urse, a serene village nestled along the foothills of the Western Ghats near Pune, is swiftly emerging as a coveted micromarket for holiday homes and premium villas. With its lush green surroundings, mild climate, and peaceful atmosphere, Urse offers a compelling alternative to over-commercialized tourist destinations. properties.title: Botanica Farmscapes
properties.description: Botanica Farmscapes is a gated luxury development spread over 20 acres in Karjat, designed as a tropical resort-style complex with a focus on wellness, sustainability, and natural living. Each plot is equipped with 30 pre-planted trees and irrigation support, offering owners the chance to experience "Garden Therapy" amidst the Western Ghats' scenic mountain and river views. With design cues inspired by the four elements of nature, Botanica provides a truly immersive eco-living experience. Ideal for second-home buyers and nature investors, the project offers the option to develop luxury villas with pools and sky decks.

location.name: Karjat, MH
location.description: Karjat is emerging as one of Maharashtra’s top second-home destinations thanks to its lush landscape, cooler climate, and proximity to both Mumbai and Pune. With planned infrastructure upgrades like the Karjat-Panvel railway extension and the proposed Mumbai Trans Harbour Link (MTHL), accessibility is improving. properties.title: Jambrung Valley
properties.description: Jambrung Valley is a luxury villa development nestled in the serene hills of Karjat, offering a nature-inspired living experience. Spread across 8 acres of lush greenery, the project features 2 & 3 BHK villas designed to harmonize with the natural landscape. Each villa comes with spacious layouts, private gardens, and terraces to offer an immersive experience of nature while enjoying modern amenities. The development includes open spaces for recreational activities and community gatherings, making it ideal for both full-time living and weekend retreats. The nearby river, mountains, and waterfalls add to the peaceful charm of the property, offering tranquility and relaxation. Whether for family living or as a second home, Jambrung Valley promises an eco-friendly, sustainable living experience.

properties.title: Shivalik Hill
properties.description: Shivalik Hill by Aranyakaa Farms is a 33-acre managed farmland community nestled in the tranquil landscape of Denkanikottai, just 90 minutes from Bengaluru. The project offers fully serviced half-acre and one-acre farm plots designed for sustainable agriculture and a peaceful second home lifestyle. Each plot is equipped with drip irrigation, water access, and pre-planted timber, fruits, and vegetables. With a village-style clubhouse, walking trails, and community zones, Shivalik Hill blends organic farming with luxury countryside living. It caters to investors seeking financial returns, lifestyle rejuvenation, and eco-conscious ownership.

It caters to investors seeking financial returns, lifestyle rejuvenation, and eco-conscious ownership.

location.name: Denkanikottai, KA
location.description: Denkanikottai is a thriving green zone in the Krishnagiri district, gaining attention for its clean climate, hilly terrain, and proximity to Bengaluru. Located just 1.5–2 hours from the city, it is ideal for buyers seeking peaceful, eco-conscious retreats. The area is fast becoming a hub for sustainable farmland projects and spiritual wellness destinations, making Tapovan a strategically located investment opportunity.

properties.title: Silpa Celestia
properties.description: Silpa Celestia offers premium villa plots in a 25-acre plotted development located in a rapidly growing area of Hyderabad. With HMDA approvals and RERA registration, the project ensures legal security and transparency. The development is designed with modern infrastructure, including CC roads, underground utilities, rainwater harvesting, and landscaped gardens. The community will offer a serene, secure living environment with amenities like 24/7 security, children's play areas, and tiled footpaths. The location is strategically placed for easy access to key zones of Hyderabad, offering great connectivity and future growth potential.

location.name: Sanga Reddy, TL
location.description: Sangareddy, located northwest of Hyderabad, is an emerging destination known for its rich cultural heritage and growing industrial landscape. With its blend of historical temples, natural greenery, and developing infrastructure, it is becoming a preferred location for sustainable real estate projects and weekend getaways. The area attracts investors and residents seeking a balance between urban connectivity and a tranquil lifestyle amid scenic surroundings.

properties.title: Navrang Farms
properties.description: Navrang Farms is a boutique collection of 31 NA-sanctioned farmhouse plots nestled in the serene backwaters of Khadakwasla Dam, just 30–40 minutes from Pune. Developed by JPL Associates, the project offers a peaceful environment for building a second home, weekend retreat, or holiday villa. With panoramic views of the dam, Sinhagad Fort, and forested hills, Navrang promises not just nature but also comfort—complete with internal roads, water & electricity connections, and a proposed clubhouse. It's ideal for investors, nature lovers, and urban dwellers seeking a healthy work-life escape.
