location.name: Khadakwasla, MH
location.description: Khadakwasla is a picturesque locality in the western outskirts of Pune, renowned for its dam, scenic landscape, and proximity to historic Sinhagad Fort. This micro market has transformed into a hotspot for holiday home buyers, nature seekers, and Pune residents seeking open land and clean air. It balances connectivity and seclusion, offering a Mahabaleshwar-like vibe just 35 minutes from the city. With limited NA land left near the dam and new roads improving access, Khadakwasla is a high-potential micromarket for early land investors.

properties.title: Sylvan Retreat
properties.description: Sylvan Retreat is a curated managed farmland community located near Hebbal and Doddaballapur, just 45–60 minutes from Bengaluru city. Spread across 18 acres, this nature-centric development offers large farmland plots starting at 6,000 sq.ft. Buyers receive access to on-demand villa construction, organic farming setups, and serene surroundings rich in flora. Whether you're seeking a weekend getaway, a lifestyle shift, or a secure investment in North Bengaluru's green belt, Sylvan Retreat provides a rare blend of affordability, exclusivity, and natural luxury.

location.name: Doddaballapura, KA
location.description: Doddaballapura is a rapidly developing area located near Bengaluru, offering a peaceful escape from the city's hustle. With an increasing demand for luxury holiday homes and residential plots in the vicinity, it is becoming an attractive investment destination. The area is well-connected to major highways, offering easy access to Bengaluru while maintaining its natural charm.

properties.title: FarmFraX - The Iris
properties.description: The Iris, a curated farmland investment opportunity by FAAB through FarmFraX, offers fractional ownership in an 8.98-acre coconut and teak-based agro-forestry parcel in Bhogganapura, Chamarajanagar. Located 4.5 km from NH 766 and at an elevation of 745m, the farm is set for high-efficiency cultivation supported by solar-powered irrigation, mini weather station, and automated fertigation. The project is ideal for urban investors seeking passive agricultural income, capital appreciation, and carbon-neutral impact.

location.name: Bhogganapura, KA
location.description: Bhogganapura is a quiet agrarian belt in Chamarajanagar district, located close to NH 766 and on the tourism corridor toward Bandipur and Wayanad. With high groundwater potential, flat terrain, and excellent agro-climatic conditions, it is emerging as a sustainable farming hub. The locality benefits from low land prices, supportive government policies, and demand from urban investors seeking land-based diversification. Ideal for nature-based income-generating farmland models.

properties.title: Blooms Estate & Eco Valley
properties.description: Blooms Estate and Eco Valley are managed farmland communities located in Shoolagiri, Krishnagiri district, providing gated access to scenic countryside living imately 60-70 km from Bengaluru. Buyers receive a 20,000 sq.ft agricultural plot with plantation of 100 trees, 2 years of maintenance, and optional farmhouse construction. For those seeking turnkey luxury, farmhouses like the 1,100 sq.ft Eco Valley home are available with landscaped sit-outs, pools, and full fencing. It's a nature-driven investment model ideal for weekend stays, long-term sustainability, or retirement.

location.name: Shoolagiri, KA
location.description: The Shoolagiri–Krishnagiri zone has seen rising demand for farm retreats, weekend homes, and green asset investments from Bengaluru-based buyers. With smooth connectivity via NH44 and increasing eco-conscious land use, this region has matured into a low-cost, high-potential micromarket. Plotted developments, managed farmlands, and agritourism infrastructure make this belt a compelling choice for hybrid living and capital appreciation.

properties.title: Vishwas Sandalwood Farm
properties.description: Vishwas Sandalwood Farms is a managed agricultural investment located near Madhugiri, about 90–100 km from Bengaluru. Designed as a high-yield, long-term investment vehicle, buyers can purchase plots starting from 5.5 guntas and receive free plantation of sandalwood, guava, mango, and pomegranate trees. The site also offers lifestyle features like cottages, clubhouses, organic stores, and wellness zones. The farm is equipped with modern irrigation, security, spa zones, and eco-tourism potential, making it suitable for both income-focused and experiential land buyers.

location.name: Madhugiri, KA
location.description: Madhugiri and Koratagere have emerged as high-potential agricultural investment corridors, favored for sandalwood plantations and eco-villages. Located within 2 hours from Bengaluru, the region boasts lower land prices, good groundwater table, proximity to tourist zones like Devarayanadurga Hills and Siddaganga Mutt, and connectivity to NH 69 and Doddaballapura Road. Managed farmland and agro-retreat models are increasingly common here.

properties.title: Winds of Malanadu
properties.description: Winds of Malanadu is a curated, managed coffee plantation community located in the lush hills of Sakleshpur. Spread across 65 acres, this gated agricultural estate combines nature, income, and peace of mind. Buyers receive half-acre or one-acre plots planted with high-yield coffee and pepper vines, along with the option to construct eco-villas. HiLiving manages all plantation, harvest, and resale logistics, offering a passive investment opportunity in one of Karnataka's top eco-tourism regions. The estate also offers estate trails, water bodies, and future homestay income potential.

location.name: Janakere, Sakleshpur, KA
location.description: Janakere is a serene hamlet nestled in the lush hills of Sakleshpur, Karnataka, known for its pristine coffee plantations, cool climate, and untouched natural beauty. Its peaceful environment and proximity to major cities like Bengaluru make it an emerging micro-market for holiday homes and sustainable farmland investments. With increasing interest in eco-tourism and agro-living, Janakere offers a perfect balance of tranquility, greenery, and long-term value for investors seeking both personal retreats and nature-based income opportunities.

properties.title: Mountains & Mangoes
properties.description: Mountains & Mangoes is a 10-acre managed farmland project nestled between Magadi and Ramanagara, just 50 km from Bengaluru. The project offers fully serviced plots with ready irrigation, native trees, and the option to grow mango, coconut, arecanut, teakwood, and sandalwood. Known for its fertile terrain and mountain-valley breeze, the estate practices ecological agriculture and supports biodiversity. It is ideal for Bengaluru-based investors seeking a farm retreat or sustainable long-term land holding.

location.name: Ramanagara, KA
location.description: Ramanagara, known as the "Land of Seven Hills," is a fast-emerging micromarket for sustainable farmland living. Located just off the Bengaluru–Mysuru corridor, this region is dotted with mango orchards, granite hills, and serene valleys, making it ideal for curated eco-retreats like Mango Dew. The area enjoys excellent connectivity via the Bengaluru-Mysuru Expressway and Kanakapura Road, while retaining a peaceful, rural charm. With rising interest from weekend travelers, nature enthusiasts, and investors, Ramanagara offers the perfect balance between proximity to Bengaluru and the tranquility of countryside life.

properties.title: Isha View

Inspired by the spiritual ambiance of the nearby Isha Foundation, the project features well-demarcated plots with essential amenities for building custom villas. Isha View is ideal for homebuyers, weekend dwellers, or long-term investors looking to own land in a rapidly appreciating zone.

location.name: Chikkaballapur, KA
location.description: Chikkaballapur, located 60 km from Bengaluru, is rapidly emerging as a sought-after destination for residential and farmland investments. properties.title: Casa Altinho
properties.description: Casa Altinho is a boutique luxury villa enclave by Fairgreen Ventures, offering a collection of four designer 4 BHK villas in the heart of Nerul, North Goa. Inspired by Goan-Portuguese architecture with a contemporary twist, each villa boasts elegant interiors, a private pool, large landscaped gardens, and serene outdoor sit-outs. With high ceilings, large windows, and heritage design influences, these homes are ideal for discerning buyers seeking a private vacation residence with long-term value and high rental potential. Located near the popular Nerul-Candolim belt, the project offers both privacy and connectivity.

location.name: Nerul, Goa
location.description: Nerul is one of North Goa's most premium residential micromarkets, known for its lush surroundings, riverfront villas, and proximity to Candolim, Reis Magos, and Panaji. It's rapidly becoming a hotspot for boutique gated developments, especially those catering to the luxury vacation home segment. The area is well connected to the new Mopa Airport, state highways, and the main North Goa tourist belt. Its strategic location allows residents and guests to enjoy peace and privacy while staying close to high-end restaurants, heritage sites, and beaches.

properties.title: Veora
properties.description: Veora is a collection of ultra-luxury villas nestled in the tranquil coastal village of Morjim, North Goa. Thoughtfully curated by ALYF, the project merges the serenity of traditional Goan living with modern design and bespoke interiors. These villas are designed for those who seek the charm of hidden beaches, coconut groves, and alfresco living, without the chaos of typical tourist hubs. With options like private pools, podium living, and paddy field views, Veora offers a rare retreat designed for both indulgence and investment.

properties.title: Green Echoes Coorg
properties.description: Green Echoes Coorg is a curated managed farmland development located amidst the lush hills of Madikeri, Coorg. Spread across 50 acres of pristine Western Ghats landscape, the project offers titled farmland plots with an option to build premium holiday cottages. Designed to offer both passive rental income and sustainable living, Green Echoes Coorg combines luxury, ecology, and investment potential in one holistic project.

location.name: Siolim, Goa
location.description: Siolim is one of North Goa's most desirable second-home destinations, known for its calm environment, lush greenery, and riverside charm. The area is witnessing a steady influx of boutique real estate projects, designer cafes, and sustainable homestays. Its proximity to Morjim, Vagator, and Assagao ensures access to Goa's prime beaches and lifestyle hubs, while still retaining a peaceful, village feel. Connectivity to Mopa Airport (30 km) and Thivim railway station (17 km) enhances its appeal. Gated villas in Siolim have seen steady appreciation of 10–12% annually due to limited supply and rising high-net-worth buyer interest.

location.description: Kanakapura, nestled on the southern fringes of Bengaluru, is rapidly transforming into a prime destination for sustainable living and managed farmlands. location.name: Anjuna, Goa
location.description: Anjuna is one of Goa's most iconic beach villages, known for its bohemian charm, vibrant nightlife, and heritage Portuguese homes. Over the past decade, the area has evolved into a premium micromarket for boutique hotels, luxury villas, and upscale cafes. The real estate landscape here benefits from limited supply and high tourist footfall, making it ideal for both holiday home ownership and short-term rentals. The presence of major music festivals, yoga retreats, and art residencies fuels steady demand. Its proximity to beaches, cafes like Artjuna and Thalassa, and infrastructure hubs like Mapusa boosts its livability and value. Connectivity via Thivim and NH66 ensures accessibility from major Indian cities.

properties.title: Sukkoon

location.name: Pangot, UK
location.description: Pangot is a peaceful hill village near Nainital known for its rich birdlife, forest cover, and eco-tourism resorts. With minimal commercialisation and panoramic views, it’s becoming a top choice for wellness and vacation home investments.

properties.title: Natadol Hills
properties.description:
Natadol Hills offers an exclusive lifestyle with independent villas set against the serene backdrop of Nainital's hills. The gated community boasts earthquake-resistant construction, premium finishes, and abundant greenery. Designed to blend seamlessly with nature, the villas offer modern living with natural views. With proximity to the major market in Nainital and the tranquil environment of Nata Dol, this project caters to both high-net-worth individuals seeking a luxurious retreat and investors looking for long-term capital appreciation. The villa layouts include duplex and simplex options with ample space, high-quality fittings, and modular kitchens.
Ideal for second-home buyers, holiday home investors, and retirees, Natadol Hills promises a strong return on investment through high capital appreciation and rental potential.

properties.title: Riverstone Farms
properties.description: Riverstone Farms is an innovative, eco-conscious luxury farm community located in Katenahalli, Chickballapur. The project combines state-of-the-art sustainable living practices with agricultural plots, providing an opportunity for investors to own and cultivate farm plots while enjoying luxury amenities. Inspired by global standards of sustainable living, Riverstone Farms offers a sanctuary where luxury meets nature. The community promotes healthy living through organic farming, and residents can experience a serene, eco-friendly lifestyle while being connected to nature and modern comforts. With a focus on sustainability and green architecture, it offers investors an opportunity for growth through land appreciation and income from farming.

properties.title: The Chapter – Sircaim
properties.description: Set in the serene village of Sircaim in North Goa, The Chapter is a boutique residential community designed to reflect slow, intentional living amidst nature. With only 24 units spread across a beautifully planned site, the project offers thoughtfully designed 2 and 3 BHK apartments with large decks, tropical landscaping, and premium finishes. Developed by a team known for blending sustainability with luxury, this community aims to be more than just a home—it's a curated lifestyle with proximity to Goa's pristine beaches, cultural hubs, and green surrounds.

location.name: Sakleshpur , KA
location.description: Sakleshpur is a hill station nestled in the biodiverse Western Ghats of Karnataka, known for its coffee plantations, heavy rainfall, and growing homestay tourism. With excellent groundwater availability and dense forest cover, the region is seeing rising interest from Bengaluru and Mangalore-based buyers looking to invest in lifestyle farmland and eco-retreats. Sakleshpur's strategic location along NH 75 (Mangalore Highway) adds to its real estate value proposition.

properties.title: European Village and Resort
properties.description: SG European Village & Resort offers a rare opportunity to own a holiday home or investment property in the pristine hills of Mukteshwar, Nainital. Set at an elevation of 7,000 feet, this project blends European-inspired architecture with modern amenities, providing a serene escape from city life. The township features customizable villas and plots and a 5-star resort within the community. Surrounded by lush forests and fruit orchards, residents enjoy panoramic mountain views, clean air, and regular snowfall in winter. With easy access to Nainital and Kathgodam, and comprehensive amenities like a clubhouse, gym, pool, and departmental store, SG European Village & Resort is ideal for real estate investors seeking rental yield, holiday home buyers desiring tranquility and rental income, and retirees looking for a healthy, peaceful lifestyle

properties.title: Roman Village and Resort
properties.description: SG Roman Village & Resort brings Roman-inspired luxury living to the tranquil hills of Dhanachuli, Nainital. Located at 7,000 feet, this gated community offers customizable plots and villas with panoramic Himalayan views, surrounded by lush oak forests and fruit orchards. Residents enjoy world-class amenities, including a 5-star resort, clubhouse, infinity pool, mini golf, tennis courts, and a helipad. The project is ideal for real estate investors seeking strong rental yields, holiday home buyers looking for a peaceful retreat with income potential, and retirees desiring a healthy, pollution-free lifestyle. With easy access to Mukteshwar, Nainital, and Bhimtal, SG Roman Village & Resort stands out as a premium investment in Uttarakhand’s emerging luxury home market.

properties.title: A Jungle Trail
properties.description: SG’s A Jungle Trail is a boutique jungle resort designed for discerning investors and buyers seeking a unique holiday home in Mukteshwar. Nestled amidst lush forests, each “A”-shaped villa is crafted from eco-friendly materials, blending seamlessly with the natural surroundings. location.name: Ranikhet, UK
location.description: Ranikhet is a tranquil cantonment town celebrated for its lush pine forests, colonial-era charm, and sweeping views of the Himalayas. As a micro market, Ranikhet is favored by investors and holiday home buyers for its pollution-free environment, proximity to top attractions like Upat Golf Course and Chaubatia Gardens, and robust infrastructure. The presence of reputed schools, army establishments, and upcoming airport connectivity further boost its appeal. Ranikhet’s property market is characterized by limited supply and high demand, ensuring strong rental yields and capital appreciation for discerning buyers.

Residents enjoy access to a clubhouse, gym, spa, yoga and meditation spaces, bicycle tracks, commercial spaces, and 24/7 water and electricity. With organic farming, open green spaces, and UHF-based entry, this project is ideal for investors targeting capital appreciation, holiday home buyers seeking a peaceful retreat, and retirees desiring a healthy, exclusive mountain environment.

location.name: Narendra Nagar , UK
location.description: Narendra Nagar is fast gaining recognition as a high-value luxury destination nestled in the lower Himalayas. Known for its serene environment, elevated altitude, and rich spiritual heritage, it offers sweeping valley views and a climate significantly cooler than the plains. Its proximity to Rishikesh, iconic wellness retreats like Ananda in the Himalayas and The Westin, and seamless access via road and airport connectivity make it ideal for premium holiday homes.

properties.title: Country Homes Mukteshwar
properties.description: Country Homes Mukteshwar is a luxury 4-star resort and gated community in Dhanachuli, Mukteshwar, Uttarakhand, offering exclusive studios and cottages with panoramic Himalayan views. In partnership with The Fern Hotels & Resorts, the project features a unique sale & leaseback model with assured returns till possession and a 30% revenue share (with minimum guarantee) post-possession. Located on the Bhatelia-Dhanachuli-Bhimtal highway, the project boasts seamless connectivity, lush landscapes, and a tranquil environment. Ideal for real estate investors seeking rental and capital gains, holiday home buyers wanting a branded retreat, and retirees looking for a serene, wellness-focused lifestyle, Country Homes Mukteshwar promises luxury, security, and long-term value.

properties.title: PRAANA
properties.description: PRAANA by Vedic City is a visionary 140-acre sustainable township in Goa that harmonizes ancient Vedic wisdom with modern wellness living. Designed as a sanctuary of vitality and rejuvenation, PRAANA offers expansive farmhouse plots ranging from 1,320 to 4,800 sq yards, thoughtfully integrated with nature and world-class wellness amenities. A key highlight is the 5-acre waterbody hosting a yoga and naturopathy wellness retreat, alongside dedicated zones for sports like jogging, horse riding, badminton, and golf putting. The project emphasizes organic living, self-sufficiency, and community-centric amenities, making it ideal for investors seeking long-term appreciation, holiday home buyers desiring serene wellness escapes, and retirees looking for tranquil, health-focused lifestyles.

It is strategically located with easy access to essential amenities. Residents benefit from well-maintained green spaces and comprehensive security measures. Overall, this development offers an exceptional blend of comfort, style, and convenience.

location.name: Siolim, Goa
location.description: Siolim is one of North Goa's most desirable second-home destinations, known for its calm environment, lush greenery, and riverside charm. The area is witnessing a steady influx of boutique real estate projects, designer cafes, and sustainable homestays. Its proximity to Morjim, Vagator, and Assagao ensures access to Goa's prime beaches and lifestyle hubs, while still retaining a peaceful, village feel. Connectivity to Mopa Airport (30 km) and Thivim railway station (17 km) enhances its appeal. Gated villas in Siolim have seen steady appreciation of 10–12% annually due to limited supply and rising high-net-worth buyer interest.

location.name: Saipem, Goa
location.description: Saipem is one of North Goa’s most exclusive and tranquil residential pockets, located just minutes from Candolim and the Nerul River. Nestled in a lush, elevated valley, Saipem has quickly become a preferred destination for luxury villa developments and high-net-worth buyers seeking privacy with proximity. Its scenic topography—marked by hills, dense greenery, and water views—offers a unique blend of serenity and accessibility. Unlike the tourist-heavy belts, Saipem offers low-density gated projects with premium pricing and tight inventory. With quick access to NH 66, Candolim beach, and top dining destinations, this micromarket has witnessed a surge in boutique developments. It's especially favored by NRIs, Bollywood celebrities, and digital entrepreneurs looking to invest in Goa’s quieter, more refined side. Property values here have appreciated steadily over the past 3–5 years, with many projects fully booked during pre-launch phases.

The area is witnessing a steady influx of boutique real estate projects, designer cafes, and sustainable homestays. Its proximity to Morjim, Vagator, and Assagao ensures access to Goa's prime beaches and lifestyle hubs, while still retaining a peaceful, village feel. Connectivity to Mopa Airport (30 km) and Thivim railway station (17 km) enhances its appeal. Gated villas in Siolim have seen steady appreciation of 10–12% annually due to limited supply and rising high-net-worth buyer interest.

location.name: Siolim, Goa
location.description: Siolim is one of North Goa's most desirable second-home destinations, known for its calm environment, lush greenery, and riverside charm. The area is witnessing a steady influx of boutique real estate projects, designer cafes, and sustainable homestays. Its proximity to Morjim, Vagator, and Assagao ensures access to Goa's prime beaches and lifestyle hubs, while still retaining a peaceful, village feel. Connectivity to Mopa Airport (30 km) and Thivim railway station (17 km) enhances its appeal. Gated villas in Siolim have seen steady appreciation of 10–12% annually due to limited supply and rising high-net-worth buyer interest.

location.name: Siolim, Goa
location.description: Siolim is one of North Goa's most desirable second-home destinations, known for its calm environment, lush greenery, and riverside charm. The area is witnessing a steady influx of boutique real estate projects, designer cafes, and sustainable homestays. Its proximity to Morjim, Vagator, and Assagao ensures access to Goa's prime beaches and lifestyle hubs, while still retaining a peaceful, village feel. Connectivity to Mopa Airport (30 km) and Thivim railway station (17 km) enhances its appeal. Gated villas in Siolim have seen steady appreciation of 10–12% annually due to limited supply and rising high-net-worth buyer interest.

location.name: Siolim, Goa
location.description: Siolim is one of North Goa's most desirable second-home destinations, known for its calm environment, lush greenery, and riverside charm. The area is witnessing a steady influx of boutique real estate projects, designer cafes, and sustainable homestays. Its proximity to Morjim, Vagator, and Assagao ensures access to Goa's prime beaches and lifestyle hubs, while still retaining a peaceful, village feel. Connectivity to Mopa Airport (30 km) and Thivim railway station (17 km) enhances its appeal. Gated villas in Siolim have seen steady appreciation of 10–12% annually due to limited supply and rising high-net-worth buyer interest.

properties.title: The Origin - Kudal
properties.description: The Origin – Kudal is a one-of-a-kind lakeside plotted development set amidst the lush, serene landscapes of Sindhudurg, Maharashtra. Designed as a tranquil second home destination, the project blends European-style lakeside living with Indian cultural richness. Surrounding a stunning 10-acre lake, it offers a premium environment for holiday homes, wellness retreats, and nature-led living. The project spans 25 acres and is packed with recreational amenities such as a meditation center, ayurvedic spa, floral gardens, tree-lined internal roads, and biophilic landscape design. Its strategic location—just 45 minutes from MOPA Airport and 25 minutes from Sindhudurg Airport—makes it easily accessible while retaining its pristine natural charm.

location.name: Kudal, MH
location.description: Kudal, Sindhudurg is emerging as a hidden gem for nature-centric investments. With pristine beaches, upcoming airport connectivity, and lush surroundings, it offers buyers affordable land and villa options ideal for farm stays, eco-tourism, and long-term growth.

properties.title: Mango Lakefront
properties.description: Mango Lakefront is a curated collection of 90 lake-facing, fully serviced villas nestled in Tapola—often hailed as the 'Mini Kashmir of Maharashtra'. Surrounded by the serene Koyna backwaters and lush green valleys, these 1 to 4 BHK villas offer luxurious living in nature's lap. Each home is thoughtfully designed with private pools, verandas, and built-in wellness features. Amenities like a clubhouse, spa, water sports, meditation zones, and organic living experiences add to the resort-like charm. Backed by a strong legacy from Mango Village Guhagar, this is a rare offering combining peace, eco-tourism, and strong investment potential.

properties.title: Country Homes Naukuchiatal
properties.description:
Country Homes Naukuchiatal offers luxurious living in the serene Kumaon hills of Uttarakhand. The gated community features exquisite studio cottages and 3 BHK duplex villas, each with breathtaking views of the Naukuchiatal. With a focus on wellness and nature, residents enjoy amenities such as a full-service clubhouse, spa, swimming pool, multi-cuisine restaurant, and nature trails. 
This eco-friendly project embraces a Sale & Leaseback model, offering guaranteed returns from a 4-star resort operation. Located in the heart of Naukuchiatal, just 1 hour from Nainital, it's perfect for holiday home buyers, retirees, and investors seeking both tranquility and high rental income.

location.description: Narendra Nagar is fast gaining recognition as a high-value luxury destination nestled in the lower Himalayas. properties.title: Vanodhara
properties.description: Vanodhara is an eco-sensitive farmland community nestled in Konalgundi, Kanakapura, designed to seamlessly blend sustainability with serenity. Centered around the theme of “Nature’s Heritage,” the project features bio-diversity forests, roundabouts named after sacred ‘Panch’ trees, and a multi-level watchtower offering panoramic views. Each plot is defined with native hedges, supported by solar-powered infrastructure, and enhanced with productive landscaping—fruit, flower, and medicinal plants. With assisted farming, natural materials, and minimal ecological footprint, Vanodhara offers not just land, but a thoughtfully cultivated lifestyle rooted in nature.

location.name: Thally, TN
location.description: Thally sits on the Tamil Nadu–Karnataka border and is often nicknamed “Little England” for its cool, misty weather. Coffee estates, lakes and low, green hills dominate the landscape, making it ideal for eco-retreats and weekend farms. New road upgrades now link the valley to Hosur and Bengaluru’s Electronic City in under an hour, fuelling second-home demand. Organic-farming cooperatives and homestays are gaining traction, signalling future tourism growth. Land values remain affordable but have begun a steady upward climb.

properties.title: Tamarind Valley collective
properties.description: Spread over 90 acres of rejuvenated terrain, Tamarind Valley Collective houses just 52 families amid rolling hills and lakes. Agro-forestry, food-forest clusters and small-scale animal husbandry create a closed-loop ecosystem. Earthen architecture, off-grid energy systems and grey-water recycling anchor its sustainable infrastructure. A central plaza with a farm-to-table café, makers’ studio and co-working loft fosters a tight community spirit. Designed as a living classroom, the estate champions slow, self-reliant living.

properties.financialReturns:
•Capital Appreciation through Infrastructure-Led Growth
With massive infrastructure projects underway—including the Konkan Marine Expressway, Adani Dighi Port, seven-creek bridges, and Navi Mumbai International Airport—land prices in Harihareshwar and Shrivardhan are set for exponential growth.
•Legally Clear, NA Sanctioned Land
Each plot is fully NA-sanctioned and RERA-compliant, with individual registration and clear title, ensuring legal security and enabling immediate villa construction or farm development.
•Flexible Investment Options & Exit Plans
Choose from retention, resale, or guaranteed buyback schemes, including an option where you retain part of the land while receiving your full capital back. For premium investors, full 5,000 sq.ft plots can be retained for long-term capital gains or developed into luxury villas.
•Multi-Modal Connectivity & Coastal Road Extension Boost - Oxygen stands at the epicenter of Maharashtra’s evolving transit network. It will soon be connected by four key modes: the Konkan Marine Expressway (Mumbai–Goa Coastal Road), Atal Setu, Ro-Ro ferry services from Mumbai, and the upcoming Navi Mumbai International Airport.This will make Harihareshwar reachable in under 2 hours from South Mumbai.

location.name: Igatpuri, MH
location.description: Igatpuri is a hill station located in the Western Ghats of Maharashtra, known for its scenic beauty and cool climate. With increasing tourism and demand for luxury retreats, it is becoming a prime location for real estate investment. Proximity to Nashik and Mumbai further enhances its appeal, making it an ideal destination for second homes and weekend getaways.

properties.title: Dev vihan villas
properties.description: Dev Vihan Villas by Icarus Builders is a premium gated villa community located on Ajmer Road, Jaipur. Spread across approximately 3.17 acres (128,000 sq. ft.), the project features 30 exclusive 3 BHK villas, each with a built-up area of around 2,600–2,700 sq. ft. Designed for modern luxury, each villa includes private pools, landscaped gardens, home theatres, and smart features like robotic retractable rooftops. The development is enriched with a clubhouse, banquet hall, temple area, kids' play zone, and green open spaces supported by 3-tier security, underground infrastructure, and lifelong maintenance making it an ideal blend of lifestyle and long-term investment potential.

location.name: Jaipur, RJ
location.description: Jaipur is emerging as a vibrant real estate destination in North India, blending its rich cultural heritage with modern urban development. The city is witnessing rapid growth driven by tourism, IT, education, and industrial expansion. Key areas like Jagatpura, Ajmer Road, Malviya Nagar, and Vaishali Nagar are seeing increased demand due to improving infrastructure, including the Ring Road, metro connectivity, and strategic location along national corridors. Peripheral regions are gaining traction for plotted developments and lifestyle homes, while regulatory support through Rajasthan RERA has strengthened buyer trust. Jaipur’s balanced mix of heritage appeal and modern livability makes it an ideal choice for long-term real estate investment.

properties.title: Green Meadows
properties.description: Green Meadows is a thoughtfully designed 25-acre gated community of NA plots near Pachane, just 15 minutes from Hinjawadi, Pune. Set alongside the Kasarsai backwaters and Sahyadri foothills, it features lush landscaping, a clubhouse with cafeteria, pool, indoor games, fitness zones, serene walking trails, co-working spaces, and EV charging. With fully serviced infrastructure, RERA-approved titles, and strong connectivity via expressways to major IT and urban centres, it combines sustainable, wellness-centric living with smart investment appeal.

location.name: Hinjewadi, MH
location.description: Hinjewadi, Pune has transformed into a premier real estate destination, driven by its status as a major IT hub and rapid infrastructure development. Anchored by the Rajiv Gandhi Infotech Park, it attracts a large professional workforce, fueling demand for residential projects ranging from high-rise apartments to premium plotted developments. Excellent connectivity via the Mumbai-Pune Expressway, upcoming Pune Metro Line 3, and major road expansions further enhance accessibility. The presence of reputed schools, hospitals, and integrated townships adds to its appeal for end-users and investors alike. With strong rental yields, steady appreciation, and regulatory transparency under MahaRERA, Hinjewadi offers a compelling mix of career proximity, urban livability, and long-term real estate value.

location.name: Tala, MH
location.description: Tala, located in Raigad district near the Mumbai–Goa Highway, is gaining traction as a promising destination for second homes, farmhouses, and plotted developments. Just 100 km from Mumbai and 130 km from Pune, it offers serene natural surroundings, proximity to Talgad Fort, and scenic views of hills and lakes. Projects like Forest Hills and premium farmhouse estates are attracting urban buyers seeking weekend retreats and long-term appreciation. With improving infrastructure paved roads, power, water supply and growing interest in eco-resorts and hospitality ventures, Tala presents a rare blend of nature, heritage, and investment potential, especially for those seeking peaceful living within driving distance of major cities.

properties.title: Nature Hills
properties.description:
Located in the serene surroundings of Agrakhal and spread over 2.5 acres of lush greenery, Nature Hills comprises 75 fully furnished 2 BHK cottages. The Project offers a peaceful retreat with modern amenities. 
Nature Hills offers alluring landscapes with breathtaking views, featuring a stunning waterfall as a highlight. Located near lush green forests, it is ideal for those looking to connect with nature.

location.name: Narendra Nagar , UK
location.description: Narendra Nagar is fast gaining recognition as a high-value luxury destination nestled in the lower Himalayas. Known for its serene environment, elevated altitude, and rich spiritual heritage, it offers sweeping valley views and a climate significantly cooler than the plains. Its proximity to Rishikesh, iconic wellness retreats like Ananda in the Himalayas and The Westin, and seamless access via road and airport connectivity make it ideal for premium holiday homes.

properties.title: The Swiss Village
properties.description: The Swiss village offers luxury villas and apartments nestled in the enchanting Himalayan suburbs at Mukteshwar Hill, standing majestically at 7500 feet elevation, offering a 180-degree panorama of the awe-inspiring Himalayan range with mesmerizing vistas of iconic snow-capped peaks such as Nanda Devi, Trishul, and Nanda Ghunti. This idyllic haven beckons as an ideal weekend retreat or serene escape for rejuvenating vacation. The township is the only property in Uttarakhand that offers city-like infrastructure with luxury 3BHK duplex Symphony Villas and Snow View Apartments. Features include stone cladding, 24/7 security with CCTV cameras, electricity connection, street lighting, modular kitchens with granite tops, premium fittings, and designer interiors. Unlike more crowded hills in the region, Mukteshwar promises tranquility and natural splendor, making it perfect for those seeking a blissful getaway.

location.name: Mukteshwar, UK
location.description: Mukteshwar is one of Uttarakhand's fastest growing holiday home zones, known for scenic views, low population density, and tourism-friendly environment. Property demand is rising due to road improvements, digital nomad preferences, and weekend home interest from NCR buyers.

properties.title: Royal Nest Forest View
properties.description: Royal Nest Forest View is adjacent to forest land where more than 500 different species of indigenous trees can be found along with a pristine view of Dhauladhar Matterhorn mountains. Located 5 kilometers from main Dharamshala market, the project is free from tourist congestion so you wake up to the sounds of chirping birds. An additional advantage of being situated on NH45, offers great connectivity and wide entry/exit to the project. Only 68 Holiday Apartments crafted for selected owners with earthquake-resistant RCC Structure, large French windows for natural lighting, rainwater harvesting, and eco-friendly construction. The project features forest facing mountain view apartments with landscaped gardens, dedicated personal parking, rooftop garden with meditation garden & walking track, gym/TT room/snooker room, kid's library/yoga room, lifts, 24x7 security service, WIFI enabled society, and 24 hours power back-up.

An additional advantage of being situated on NH45, offers great connectivity and wide entry/exit to the project. Only 68 Holiday Apartments crafted for selected owners with earthquake-resistant RCC Structure, large French windows for natural lighting, rainwater harvesting, and eco-friendly construction. The project features forest facing mountain view apartments with landscaped gardens, dedicated personal parking, rooftop garden with meditation garden & walking track, gym/TT room/snooker room, kid's library/yoga room, lifts, 24x7 security service, WIFI enabled society, and 24 hours power back-up.

location.name: Dharamshala, HP
location.description: Dharamshala is situated in the mighty ranges of Himalayas overlooking the Dhauladhar array of mountains and serves as the winter capital of Himachal Pradesh. The city has global popularity and recognition as home to Buddhist followers and the Dalai Lama. The area offers pristine beauty with 41% forest land cover, fresh air, fresh water from high rainfall, and one of the safest environments with negligible crime rate. Dharamshala provides a peaceful blend of meditative Buddhism and Hinduism making it ideal for holiday homes and spiritual retreats.

properties.title: Belvoir Hills
properties.description: Belvoir Hills is a luxury retreat in Chail, Himachal Pradesh, spread across  6.5 acres at an altitude of 5,000 feet. The project offers premium 2, 3 & 4 BHK cottages and studio/1 BHK apartments, all designed to maximize green valley views and natural light. It features resort-style amenities, a club house with 5-star facilities, independent splash pools in cottages, and extensive landscaped lawns. The gated community provides 24x7 security, housekeeping, medical shop and doctor on call, and is surrounded by pollution-free, noise-free natural greenery.

location.name: Chail, HP
location.description: Chail is a serene hill station near Solan, known for its pristine forests, cool climate, and low population density. It is less crowded than Shimla or Kasauli, making it ideal for peaceful living or holiday homes. Chail is famous for its heritage hotels, wildlife sanctuary, and the world's highest cricket ground. The area is witnessing increasing demand for luxury cottages and second homes due to its tranquility, accessibility, and improved infrastructure.

properties.title: Chester Hills
properties.description: Chester Hills is Solan's first premium gated residential development, offering a blend of luxury apartments and villas set amidst the pristine Kasauli hills. The project is designed for a harmonious living experience, with eco-friendly features, city-like amenities, and generous balconies offering relaxing views. Thoughtful architecture, larger-than-usual window areas, and sliding doors maximize natural light and the scenic Himalayan landscape. Chester Hills is ideal for families, retirees, and investors looking for secure, green living options.

location.name: Solan, HP
location.description: Solan is a rapidly developing hill city, known for its moderate climate, excellent connectivity, and robust infrastructure. The city is a hub for education, healthcare, and industry, and is witnessing a surge in demand for residential and holiday homes, especially post-pandemic. Solan's real estate market is driven by its proximity to Chandigarh, affordable property rates, and a growing influx of professionals and retirees seeking a peaceful lifestyle.

properties.title: Terra Hill
properties.description: Mogg's Terra Hill is a 40-acre managed farmland community located in Kunigal, just 45 minutes from Nelamangala off the Bengaluru-Mangaluru Expressway. This project offers 85 curated plots with forest-bearing plantation strategies and amenities like a 4-acre water stream, cycling paths, a clubhouse, badminton courts, a temple, and more. Each plot comes with customized fruit, forest, and vegetable plantation options, supported by a sustainable and agronomist-backed farm management service. Ideal for city dwellers looking to reconnect with nature, the project ensures complete land ownership and a secure, eco-friendly investment.

location.name: Kunigal , KA
location.description: Kunigal, part of Tumkur district, is fast emerging as a popular destination for managed farmland communities due to its proximity to Bengaluru, fertile land, and expressway connectivity. With water sources like the Makedatu project nearby and increased demand for weekend eco-retreats, land in this region is witnessing rapid appreciation.

properties.title: Cliffton Valley
properties.description: Cliffton Valley is a premium gated community in Mehli, Shimla, offering 2 BHK, and 3 BHK apartments with uninterrupted valley views and abundant sunlight. Designed by internationally renowned architect Javier Pioz, the project blends bionic architecture with the pristine natural surroundings of Shimla. It is the first project in Shimla to offer lifts in all blocks, ample parking, and more than 70% open green area. With a focus on eco-friendly living, Cliffton Valley features earthquake-resistant construction, landscaped gardens, and modern amenities. Each apartment is thoughtfully planned for privacy, elegance, and comfort, making it ideal for both end-users and investors seeking a luxurious retreat in the Himalayas.

location.name: Shimla, HP
location.description: Shimla is one of Himachal Pradesh’s most prominent real estate micromarkets, offering a blend of scenic beauty, colonial charm, and robust infrastructure. Its year-round tourist appeal and state capital status drive consistent demand for second homes, holiday villas, and investment properties, making it a sought-after destination for both end-users and investors.

properties.title: Green Valley
properties.description: Himalayas Green Valley offers a rare opportunity to own premium villa plots in the serene hills of Lansdowne, Uttarakhand. Located at 1,168 meters above sea level, the project is surrounded by dense oak, deodar, and pine forests, with spectacular Himalayan and valley views. Residents enjoy a peaceful climate with occasional snowfall and a pollution-free environment. The gated society features a yoga center with a 180° valley view, a green park with a kids' play area, a restaurant, and a swimming pool. Ideal for nature lovers, retirees, and holiday home investors, this project promises a tranquil lifestyle in the lap of Garhwal.

properties.title: Urban Greens
properties.description: Urban Greens is an 8-acre premium residential development in Palampur, designed for ultra-luxury living in harmony with nature. The project includes a shopping arcade, club house, swimming pool, and ample recreational spaces.

Palampur offers a mix of apartments, villas, and plots, with prices ranging from ₹2,000–₹2,333/sq.ft for apartments and higher for premium villas.

properties.title: La Campana
properties.description: La Campana offers elegant, spacious luxury apartments with expansive balconies, panoramic Dhauladhar mountain views, and riverside tranquility. The project features nature-inspired architecture, landscaped walkways, and a low-density layout to foster a peaceful, close-knit community. Amenities include a rooftop swimming pool, amphitheater, kids' play area, jogging track, cricket pitch, archery, yoga and meditation room, and more. Security is ensured with 24/7 gated surveillance, and each unit is designed for maximum comfort, natural light, and seamless integration with the scenic surroundings.

properties.title: The Vilasya
properties.description: The Vilasya is a premier luxury residential project in Kufri, Shimla, offering a blend of modern architecture, eco-friendly design, and breathtaking Himalayan views. Each villa and villament is meticulously crafted for sophistication, comfort, and sustainability, with spacious interiors, large balconies, and panoramic vistas. The gated community features a full-service clubhouse, temperature-controlled pool, spa, gym, yoga deck, multi-cuisine restaurant, and extensive landscaped areas. Residents enjoy a tranquil, pollution-free environment just 25 minutes from Shimla, making The Vilasya an ideal choice for holiday homes, investment, or permanent residence.

location.name: Kufri, HP
location.description: Kufri is a renowned hill station near Shimla, famous for its scenic beauty, cool climate, adventure sports, and proximity to Shimla (15 km). The region attracts both tourists and long-term residents seeking luxury, tranquility, and modern amenities. Kufri's real estate market is witnessing rapid growth, with premium projects like The Vilasya leading the trend for high-end holiday homes and investment properties.

properties.title: The Kasul
properties.description: The Kasul is an ultra-luxury residential estate villa project in Dharampur, Kasauli. Set at an altitude of 4,500 ft, this low-density, gated township offers just 36 exclusive 4 & 5 BHK villas, each with a private heated infinity pool, independent lift, and panoramic valley views. Spread across 13 acres with 2.5 acres of open gardens, the project is designed for privacy, wellness, and grandeur. Residents enjoy a 5-star resort lifestyle with a lavish clubhouse, fine dining, squash and tennis courts, spa, and a perennial stream flowing through the site.

properties.title: Hemilton by Chester Hills
properties.description: Hemilton is a luxury resort hotel and villa project in Dharampur, Himachal Pradesh. The project comprises 132 fully furnished studio apartments (630 sq.ft each) operated by Ananta Spa & Resorts, alongside 42 exclusive 3BHK villas (280 & 360 sq. yd options). Owners of studio apartments enjoy a unique leaseback model: Ananta manages and operates the property, providing owners a 6% fixed annual return, 20 nights of complimentary stays at any Ananta property, and a complimentary wedding package (2 nights, 50 rooms per night). The project is set amidst 8 acres of lush hills, offering panoramic valley and forest views, and is designed for those seeking a blend of investment, luxury, and hospitality.

The project offers 162 spacious residential plots in three sizes—200, 250, and 300 sq. yards—each with full-day sunshine, wide 5–7 meter internal roads, and panoramic Himalayan views. The gated community is designed for luxury and tranquility, featuring a clubhouse, gym, spa, Jacuzzi, private theater, walking tracks, and landscaped parks.

properties.title: The Forest Chalet
properties.description:
The Forest Chalet is a RERA-approved luxury residential project nestled in 2.5 acres of lush forest in Shimla, offering spacious 3BHK apartments and opulent 4BHK sky villas. Designed for discerning buyers seeking tranquility and modern comforts, the project features drive-in access, earthquake-resistant construction, and a gated community with 24x7 security. All homes are legally available to non-Himachal residents, with no special permissions required. 
Residents enjoy panoramic forest views, open-plan layouts, and premium finishes, with amenities like lifts in every block, jogging trails, children's park, and ample parking. Located within Shimla MC limits, just 6.5 km from Mall Road, The Forest Chalet provides a rare combination of peaceful hill living and city convenience. Developed by Greatwall Infrastructure Pvt. Ltd., the project is ideal for second-home buyers, investors, and families seeking a serene yet connected lifestyle in the heart of the Himalayas.

location.description: Shimla is one of Himachal Pradesh’s most prominent real estate micromarkets, offering a blend of scenic beauty, colonial charm, and robust infrastructure. properties.title: The Eminence Chalet
properties.description:
The Eminence Chalet in Barog, Himachal Pradesh, redefines luxury hill living with fully furnished 1BHK and 3BHK duplex homes, all offering panoramic Himalayan and valley views at 5,000 feet above sea level. Set within a secure, gated community on 4 acres, the project features 65% open green space, double-height living areas, private jacuzzis, and advanced home automation with Alexa support. 
Each residence includes high-end furniture, elegant décor, modular kitchens with cutlery, luxury bathrooms, and motorized curtains for a seamless living experience. Designed for discerning buyers seeking tranquility, style, and sustainability, The Eminence Chalet delivers a unique blend of eco-conscious development, premium amenities, and professional maintenance. The project's strategic Barog location ensures easy access to Solan, Chandigarh, and major hill attractions, making it ideal for second-home seekers, retirees, and investors focused on rental potential and long-term value.

properties.title: Ourea Valley
properties.description:
Ourea Valley is a RERA-approved luxury apartment project in Kumarhatti, Solan, offering spacious 2BHK and 3BHK homes with stunning Kasauli hill views. Spread across 2.5 acres, the development features 82 premium residences, each with large terrace balconies (164–217 sq.ft), modern layouts, and high-quality finishes. Residents enjoy a grand clubhouse with a swimming pool, spa, gym, gold class movie theater, café, restaurant, and guest rooms.
Outdoor amenities include tennis and badminton courts, a basketball court, cycling track, and children's park, all within a secure, gated community at 5,300 feet elevation. The project's prime location ensures excellent connectivity to Chandigarh, Solan, and Kasauli, making it ideal for second-home buyers, families, and investors seeking a blend of luxury, nature, and strong rental potential. Ourea Valley is bank-approved, self-funded, and offers panoramic views, power backup, laundry, daily needs store, and ample parking for a truly elevated lifestyle.

properties.title: Vianaar Kasauli
properties.description: Vianaar Kasauli is a newly launched luxury villa community spread across 4 acres in the serene hills of Kasauli, Himachal Pradesh. The gated enclave features just 34 exclusive 2 and 3 BHK villas, each with a private landscaped garden, G+1 structure, and contemporary design. Villas are thoughtfully planned for natural light, privacy, and seamless indoor-outdoor living, with plot sizes ranging from 106–187 sq.m. for 2 BHKs and 141–155 sq.m. for 3 BHKs. Residents enjoy panoramic valley and forest views, 24x7 security, and access to Kasauli's charming colonial town and nature trails. Developed by Vianaar Homes, the project is ideal for discerning buyers seeking a tranquil second home or investment property with high appreciation and rental potential in one of Himachal's most coveted micro-markets.

Villas are thoughtfully planned for natural light, privacy, and seamless indoor-outdoor living, with plot sizes ranging from 106–187 sq.m. for 2 BHKs and 141–155 sq.m. for 3 BHKs. Residents enjoy panoramic valley and forest views, 24x7 security, and access to Kasauli's charming colonial town and nature trails. Developed by Vianaar Homes, the project is ideal for discerning buyers seeking a tranquil second home or investment property with high appreciation and rental potential in one of Himachal's most coveted micro-markets.

location.name: Kasauli, HP
location.description: Kasauli is a scenic hill station, known for its cool weather, colonial architecture, and proximity to key destinations like Shimla and Chandigarh. The growing interest in second homes and vacation properties in this region makes Kasauli Paraiso a unique and valuable investment opportunity.

properties.title: Haridwar Paradise
properties.description: Haridwar Paradise is a landmark 70-acre integrated township near Patanjali Yogpeeth, offering Plots, RTMI 2 BHK simplex villas and 3 BHK duplex villas with modern luxury specifications. The gated community features 2-tier security, lush green parks, wide roads, and a grand clubhouse with swimming pool, gym, meditation center, and outdoor party areas. Each villa is designed for comfort and sustainability, with solar-powered water heaters, VRF air conditioning, and double-glazed windows for energy efficiency and noise reduction. Residents enjoy proximity to spiritual hubs like Har Ki Pauri, Patanjali Yogpeeth, and Rajaji National Park, along with top schools, hospitals, and shopping centers. With HRDA and RERA approval, bank loans available, and a vibrant, secure environment, Haridwar Paradise is ideal for families, retirees, and investors seeking a blend of divinity, wellness, and modern living in one of India’s fastest-growing spiritual and wellness destinations.

location.name: Haridwar, UK
location.description: Haridwar’s Patanjali corridor is a booming micro-market, driven by demand for premium villas, wellness homes, and gated communities. The area attracts families, retirees, and investors seeking proximity to Patanjali Yogpeeth, Har Ki Pauri, and Rajaji National Park. Prices for villas and apartments range from ₹3,000–₹5,000/sq.ft, with annual appreciation of 8–10%. The micro-market’s appeal is enhanced by improved connectivity via NH-58, upcoming expressways, and the influx of wellness tourism and spiritual seekers, making it ideal for both end-users and rental investors.

properties.title: Whispering Pines
properties.description: Whispering Pines is a gated plotted and villa community in the tranquil hills of Devprayag, Pauri Garhwal, spread over 5 acres with 178 plots ranging from 100 to 300 sq. yards. Priced at ₹25,000 per sq. yard, the project features 20 ft wide internal roads, landscaped parks, designated car parking, and a clubhouse with gym and indoor games. Residents enjoy panoramic Himalayan views, lush pine forests, and winter snowfall, making it perfect for a peaceful, nature-infused lifestyle. Instant registration is available, and a special pre-launch offer applies to the first 50 bookings. Ideal for investors and second-home buyers, Whispering Pine offers modern amenities, spiritual energy, and long-term appreciation in the Garhwal region.

location.name: Pauri Garhwal, UK
location.description: Pauri Garhwal is a serene and spiritually significant micro-market in Uttarakhand, known for its natural beauty, Himalayan views, and growing demand for holiday homes and plots. The area attracts second-home buyers, retirees, and investors seeking tranquility and scenic surroundings. Property prices are affordable compared to other hill stations, with increasing interest in gated communities offering modern amenities. The region benefits from good connectivity to Devprayag and other major towns, making it a promising location for long-term appreciation and rental potential.

properties.title: Amravati Hills
properties.description: Amravati Hills is a prestigious hilltop township, located on Subathu Road, Solan, at 5,000 feet elevation. Spanning 50 acres, the project offers spacious 2 & 3 BHK Alpine Apartments, penthouses, and 4BHK villas with panoramic valley and forest views. Residents enjoy a modern clubhouse with a restaurant, café, fireplace, pickleball court, and wellness amenities. Each home features premium finishes, modular kitchens, and smart technology, with infrastructure including overhead water tanks, STP, stormwater drainage, and robust power supply. The township is just 3 km from Solan, 45 km from Chandigarh, and offers both seclusion and connectivity. Amravati Hills is RERA-approved, with instant registration, covered parking, and EV charging for each unit, making it ideal for families, second-home seekers, and investors seeking luxury, sustainability, and long-term value in Solan's most coveted address.

location.name: Solan, HP
location.description: Solan is a rapidly developing hill city, known for its moderate climate, excellent connectivity, and robust infrastructure. The city is a hub for education, healthcare, and industry, and is witnessing a surge in demand for residential and holiday homes, especially post-pandemic. Solan's real estate market is driven by its proximity to Chandigarh, affordable property rates, and a growing influx of professionals and retirees seeking a peaceful lifestyle.

properties.title: Ecowood Habitat
properties.description: Ecowood Habitat by Ardini Projects is a 100-acre managed farmland development nestled in Lepakshi, Andhra Pradesh, just 70 minutes from Bengaluru International Airport. Positioned beside the tranquil Gollapalli Reservoir and amidst scenic windmill landscapes, this project blends urban farming, sustainability, and wellness. With over 80% of plantation dedicated to Red Sandalwood and the rest to fruit-bearing trees, this community offers buyers an income-generating asset with long-term ecological and investment value. The development includes premium lifestyle amenities, eco-tourism opportunities, and well-planned community spaces.

location.description: Lepakshi is a fast-emerging nature investment zone located just beyond the Karnataka-Andhra border, offering proximity to NH 544E and industrial zones like KIA Motors. properties.title: Bellevuee Farmlands
properties.description: Bellevuee Farmlands by Arinaa Country Farms is a 22-acre managed farmland development located in Kanakapura, just under 90 minutes from South Bengaluru. Inspired by traditional Indian villages, the project integrates nature, culture, and modern farming practices to offer a sustainable and experiential investment. With a central resort clubhouse, themed village square, and pre-designed plantations supported by expert agronomy teams, Bellevuee is ideal for weekend getaways, passive income generation, and long-term ecological wealth creation. The project ensures clear land titles, modern irrigation, and seamless post-purchase services.

location.name: Kanakapura, KA
location.description: Kanakapura, nestled on the southern fringes of Bengaluru, is rapidly transforming into a prime destination for sustainable living and managed farmlands. Surrounded by forest reserves and hillocks, the region boasts clean air, red fertile soil, and natural water bodies—making it ideal for organic farming and eco-tourism. Its proximity to Bannerghatta and the NICE Road ensures convenient access, while infrastructure upgrades and weekend travel demand from South Bengaluru are fueling real estate growth in the area. Kanakapura Road is also seeing increasing interest in low-density layouts, lifestyle farms, and retirement retreats.

properties.title: Oxygen Acres
properties.description: Oxygen Acres is an ultra-premium plotted development located along the Delhi–Ajmer Expressway in Jaipur, offering a tranquil lifestyle amid approximately 9.3 acres of green and open spaces. Spread across 30 acres, the gated township is thoughtfully designed with theme parks, a clubhouse, spice and herbal gardens, and extensive recreational areas. With wide internal roads, rainwater harvesting systems, and landscape-driven planning, Oxygen Acres blends sustainable living with modern infrastructure—ideal for building a nature-aligned second home or investment villa.

location.name: Jaipur, RJ
location.description: Jaipur is emerging as a vibrant real estate destination in North India, blending its rich cultural heritage with modern urban development. The city is witnessing rapid growth driven by tourism, IT, education, and industrial expansion. Key areas like Jagatpura, Ajmer Road, Malviya Nagar, and Vaishali Nagar are seeing increased demand due to improving infrastructure, including the Ring Road, metro connectivity, and strategic location along national corridors. Peripheral regions are gaining traction for plotted developments and lifestyle homes, while regulatory support through Rajasthan RERA has strengthened buyer trust. Jaipur’s balanced mix of heritage appeal and modern livability makes it an ideal choice for long-term real estate investment.

properties.title: Samsara
properties.description: Yaduraj Samsara is a serene gated plotted township spread across approximately 10 acres near Mahindra SEZ and Manipal University, Ajmer Road, Jaipur. The project features landscaped gardens, fruit tree groves, lotus ponds, and wellness amenities like forest walks, meditation decks, and senior citizen zones. Jewel Sapphire is a boutique luxury apartment project in the heart of Dehradun, set on 1 acre and offering 90 ultra-premium 3 and 4 BHK residences and penthouses.

Residents enjoy a world-class gym, sauna, steam, jogging track, kids' pool, and landscaped gardens. With a central location near top schools, hospitals, and shopping, Jewel Sapphire is ideal for families, professionals, and investors seeking a blend of luxury and convenience.

properties.title: The Solitaire Vista
properties.description: The Solitaire Vista is a luxury high-rise residential project in Sewla Kalan, Dehradun. This 9-storey tower offers 54 spacious 3 BHK apartments, each designed with large balconies, UPVC windows, premium sanitary fittings, and a model kitchen with RO, chimney, and cooktop. The project features modern architecture, sophisticated interiors, and panoramic views of the Doon valley and Mussoorie hills. Amenities include a gym, indoor games, table tennis, community hall, open parking, high-speed lifts, 24/7 CCTV surveillance, and 1 KVA power backup. Located just 1.9 km from ISBT, 4.6 km from the railway station, and close to top schools and hospitals, The Solitaire Vista blends elegance, comfort, and connectivity for families and professionals seeking a refined lifestyle in Dehradun's premium micro-market.

properties.title: Altura Lux
properties.description: Altura Lux is an ultra-luxurious, RERA-registered apartment project located in the prime GMS Road micro-market of Dehradun. With just 35 exclusive 2 and 3 BHK smart homes, the project offers Alexa-enabled automation, keyless entry, private balconies, and premium finishes. Amenities include a swimming pool, gym, banquet hall, landscaped gardens, EV charging, and 24x7 power backup. The complex is designed for seismic safety and features advanced security with CCTV, access control, and fire-fighting systems. Surrounded by greenery and close to schools, hospitals, ISBT, and shopping, Altura Lux is ideal for families, professionals, and investors seeking a blend of convenience, security, and luxury in Dehradun's fastest-growing residential hub.

properties.title: Corsica Heights
properties.description: Corsica Heights is a luxury residential project on Sahastradhara Road, Dehradun, offering 100 spacious 2 & 3 BHK apartments and penthouses. Each home is designed for maximum daylight, cross-ventilation, and panoramic views of Mussoorie and Sahastradhara's lush greenery. The project features modern architecture, earthquake-resistant RCC frame, anti-skid tiles, and premium finishes. Residents enjoy a swimming pool, open gym, rooftop garden, clubhouse, children's park, jogging track, and EV charging. Located near Touchwood School and major city hubs, Corsica Heights blends urban convenience with tranquil, nature-inspired living in one of Dehradun's most desirable micro-markets.

properties.title: Jamston Retreat
properties.description:
Jamston Retreat is a luxury plotted development in Kinsu, Dhanaulti, offering 125 freehold plots across 8 acres in the lower Himalayas. Designed for holiday home buyers, nature lovers, and investors, the project feature options to construct 2 BHK villas with panoramic mountain views, and abundant greenery. Residents enjoy access to a luxury clubhouse, spa, gym, miniplex, and exclusive event venues for destination weddings. The project's high-altitude location ensures pollution-free air, year-round cool climate, and seasonal snowfall. 
Jamston Retreat provides secure, gated living with modern amenities. Its proximity to Mussoorie, eco-sensitive design, and investment potential make it ideal for second-home seekers and wellness-focused buyers.

location.name: Kufri
location.description: Kufri is a renowned hill station near Shimla, famous for its scenic beauty, cool climate, adventure sports, and proximity to Shimla (15 km). The region attracts both tourists and long-term residents seeking luxury, tranquility, and modern amenities. Kufri's real estate market is witnessing rapid growth, with premium projects like The Vilasya leading the trend for high-end holiday homes and investment properties.

properties.title: Symphony
properties.description:
This township is the only property in Uttarakhand that offers city-like infrastructure. Nestled in the enchanting Himalayan suburbs, Mukteshwar Hill stands majestically at an elevation of 7500 feet, offering a breathtaking 180-degree panorama of the awe-inspiring Himalayan range. Revel in the mesmerizing vistas of iconic snow-capped peaks such as Nanda Devi, Trishul, and Nanda Ghunti, creating a picture-perfect backdrop.
This idyllic haven, conveniently close to the bustling city of New Delhi, beckons as an ideal weekend retreat or a serene escape for a rejuvenating vacation. Unlike the more crowded hills in the region, Mukteshwar promises tranquillity and natural splendour, making it the perfect destination for those seeking a blissful getaway.

location.name: Mukteshwar
location.description: Mukteshwar is a rapidly emerging micro-market in Uttarakhand, renowned for its pristine environment, panoramic Himalayan views, and year-round pleasant climate. The area has witnessed increasing demand from investors and holiday home buyers seeking a peaceful retreat with strong rental prospects. With improving road connectivity, proximity to Nainital and Kathgodam, and a thriving hospitality sector, Mukteshwar offers excellent potential for capital appreciation and rental yields. Its clean air, scenic landscapes, and low-density development make it ideal for retirees and those seeking a healthy lifestyle in the hills.

properties.title: Vanya Awas
properties.description: What others seek, becomes your own. Spread across 20+ acres, comprising 255 apartments in phase I near the forests of Lataguri make for a rhapsodic retelling of the enchantment of the woods. Where the lyrical and the idyllic resonate with the grace of Mother Nature. Where you long to return. Happily ever after. One and a half hours away from Siliguri, this 20+ acre development of Vanya Awas located at Lataguri in the heart of Dooars offers a perfect setting for the forest retreat you wished for. Dwelling close to the woods while enjoying every perk of modern living, with the trees, the birds as well as a timid stream or jhora to cast a spell on you.

location.name: Dooars
location.description: Dooars at the doorstep of Gorumara National Park, forming the green gateway between the Himalayan foothills and the tea-garden plains of Jalpaiguri. Growing safari tourism and weekend traffic from Siliguri and Guwahati have sparked demand for eco-resorts and boutique forest villas, yet land prices remain a fraction of Darjeeling or Kalimpong. NH-31’s ongoing four-lane upgrade and the Bengal Safari Park-Lataguri circuit are bringing a steady rise in occupancy rates (55-60 % off-season, 75 %+ in winter), positioning Dooars as an early-stage appreciation play with a strong nature-tourism rental story.

properties.title: Rio De Goa
properties.description: Tata Rio De Goa is professionally landscaped to give you the experience of resort living. The Swimming Pool, Yoga deck, Garden Area, Exercise Terrace, and Green Walkways create a perfect symphony of technology and peaceful ambiance. It is very thoughtfully placed in the lush green cover near Zuari River, Dabolim Goa. It is the South Goa part that attracts people like bees. The cosmopolitan heritage and the metropolitan feels is what one gets here. Treat yourself better with this gorgeous housing segment.

location.name: Dabolim
location.description: Anchored by Goa’s original international airport and the six-lane Zuari bridge, Dabolim has evolved from a navy township into a prime residential-cum-hospitality hub that serves both North and South Goa markets. The micromarket enjoys year-round demand from charter tourists, airline crews and work-cationers, supporting 70 %+ average occupancy and robust ADRs for branded serviced apartments and resort condominiums. Limited developable land, proximity to Vasco’s urban amenities, and seamless connectivity via the Vasco-Madgaon rail line and NH-66 keep capital values trending 10-12 % annually, while the new Mopa airport shifts mass tourism northward—making Dabolim a resilient, mid-to-upscale “airport city” with enduring rental yields.

properties.title: Aroha de Goa
properties.description: Aroha De Goa – Homes with Soul of a Resort. The entire planning of Aroha De Goa is based on the idea of Fusion. It gives you the feel of being in Goa with ultra modern facilities in all the apartments operated by Zone By the Park Hotels. Here everything you need is just a walk away. Aroha De Goa is truly a benchmark of privileged living and pampered lifestyle.

properties.title: Sushma Elementa
properties.description: Sushma Elementa is a premium gated community of ultra-luxury studio, 1, 2.5 and 3.5 BHK apartments nestled on a 4.4-acre hillside just outside Dharampur in Kasauli, offering sweeping Himalayan views and an immersive, nature-integrated living experience. Developed by Sushma Buildtech, the project comprises eight mid-rise towers (G+7 floors) with 382 thoughtfully designed units featuring balconies, Vastu-aligned layouts, and quality finishes. Residents enjoy a rich amenity mix including a clubhouse with gym, spa/sauna, library, indoor games, barbecue lawns, children's play zones, jogging and cycling trails, and 24×7 power and security. Positioned a short drive from Chandigarh (around 60 minutes) and close to the highway and essential services, it combines tranquil hillside living with excellent access. RERA-approved and targeted for possession between late 2024 and 2026, Sushma Elementa aims to deliver a hassle-free holiday‑home lifestyle with turnkey delivery and potential rental upside.

location.name: Kasauli
location.description: Kasauli is a prominent hill station in Himachal Pradesh, known for its pristine environment, moderate climate, and scenic beauty. The area is witnessing a surge in luxury real estate demand, especially for gated villa projects, due to its proximity to Chandigarh and Delhi, strict construction norms, and limited land supply. Kasauli offers a peaceful, pollution-free lifestyle with strong appreciation and rental prospects.

properties.title: Woods
properties.description: Woods by Doodle Homes is an exclusive luxury villa development in Lonavala, offering thoughtfully designed 3, 4, 5, and 6 BHK villas within a 6.25-acre gated community. With modern architecture, a private lagoon, a central Zen-inspired garden, and a premium clubhouse, the project is ideal for holiday home buyers and investors seeking a serene lifestyle amidst nature. Located just 3.5 km from the Lonavala Second Exit and 1.5 km from the iconic Kinara Dhaba, Woods ensures excellent connectivity, contemporary comforts, and ample privacy.

location.name: Kamshet, MH
location.description: Kamshet, situated between Pune and Lonavala, is gaining traction as a micro-market for weekend homes and plotted developments. Surrounded by lakes, hills, and paragliding zones, it appeals to nature-driven buyers seeking peaceful retreats. With strong connectivity via the Mumbai–Pune Expressway and rail network, it offers easy access from both cities. As nearby hubs like Lonavala mature, Kamshet presents a more affordable, early-stage investment opportunity with high lifestyle and long-term value potential.

properties.title: Surakhsha Enclave
properties.description: Suraksha Enclave is a premium NA bungalow plot community near the Mumbai–Pune Highway at Kanhe Phata. With clear titles, ready infrastructure, and modern amenities like a clubhouse, gym, and landscaped gardens, it offers a balanced blend of nature, connectivity, and future growth. Surrounded by residential hubs and close to Hinjawadi, Talegaon MIDC, and educational institutions, it’s ideal for building a second home or long-term asset.

location.name: Talegaon, MH
location.description: Talegaon, nestled between Pune and Mumbai, offers a unique blend of natural serenity and urban connectivity. Surrounded by lush hills and enjoying a pleasant climate year-round, it has become a favored destination for those seeking a peaceful lifestyle close to city centers. Its strategic location ensures easy access to both Pune and Mumbai via expressways and railways, while the presence of educational institutions, healthcare facilities, and green open spaces adds to its appeal. With a balance of natural beauty and growing infrastructure, Talegaon is ideal for those looking to settle or invest in a well-connected yet tranquil environment.

properties.title: Riverdale
properties.description: Minka Riverdale is an exclusive gated villa community by Arpanna Group, set on 5.7 acres along scenic Gangapur Road, Nashik. Featuring 51 premium 4.5 BHK independent villas with private elevators, terraces, and balconies, it offers European-Zen design wrapped in lush greenery. Investors and families will appreciate the serene setting beside the Godavari River, blending luxury, privacy, and city connectivity

location.name: Gangapur, MH
location.description: Gangapur Road in Nashik is a scenic and sought-after micro-market, ideal for second homes and nature-inspired living. Nestled along the Godavari River and near Gangapur Dam, the area offers lush greenery, vineyard views, and a peaceful lifestyle just minutes from Nashik’s bustling core. With excellent road and rail connectivity, proximity to tourist spots like Sula Vineyards and the Nashik Trimbakeshwar belt, and a growing number of wellness retreats and lifestyle communities, Gangapur blends natural charm with convenient access making it a perfect getaway and investment destination just outside the city.

properties.title: Arunyam
properties.description: Arunyam is an exclusive NA villa-plot community set in the serene landscapes of Kondivade near Pune. Spanning approximately acres, it offers premium freehold plots for crafting personalized courtyard-style homes. Inspired by woodland tranquility, it provides an intimate blend of nature, privacy, and design flexibility perfect for weekend retreats or long-term wellness living.

location.name: Kondiwane, MH
location.description: Kondiwane, located near Lonavala in the Western Ghats, is a tranquil village famed for the ancient Buddhist Kondana Caves dating back to the first century B.C. The area features scenic trekking trails, lush forests, and cascading waterfalls, offering visitors a unique blend of natural beauty and rich cultural heritage. Its proximity to popular destinations like Lonavala and Karla makes Kondiwane an ideal peaceful retreat for nature lovers and history enthusiasts alike.

properties.title: Lakeview

Designed as a serene weekend retreat or long-term wellness abode, it offers excellent connectivity to Nashik and Mumbai, alongside breathtaking views of the lake and surrounding hills.

location.name: Modale , MH
location.description: Modale, located between Nashik and Igatpuri, is an emerging micro-market known for its clean, green surroundings and strong rural infrastructure. With good road access, basic civic amenities, and proximity to Nashik’s industrial and educational zones, it offers solid potential for plotted developments and nature-based retreats. The village’s focus on sustainability and community development makes it a promising early-stage investment destination for those seeking long-term value in a serene, well-connected setting.

properties.title: LonaValley
properties.description: Lonavalley is an exclusive, resort-sanctioned plotted development set amidst 108 acres of verdant landscapes in Khandshi, Nesave, near Lonavala. Offering premium 10,000 sq.ft. plots, the project blends natural serenity with thoughtfully planned wellness and resort amenities. Surrounded by Dam Shirota, Dam Uskan, and flanked by the River Uda and Indrayani, the location offers breathtaking views and a tranquil ambiance. Designed to be Vaastu-compliant and developed by experts in wellness living, it is perfect for weekend retreats, lifestyle investments, or long-term wellness-centric living.
