location.name: Nesave, MH
location.description: Nesave, a quaint micro-market near Lonavala nestled amidst the Sahyadri hills, offers a serene getaway experience with its tranquil landscapes and verdant surroundings. Just off the Mumbai Pune Expressway and close to Kamshet town, this locale is ideal for travelers seeking hills, lakes, and cave exploration away from the usual tourist trails. Well-positioned for wellness retreats and boutique farmhouses, Nesave features Vaastu-compliant plotting projects that harmonize with the natural terrain. Travelers can enjoy easy access to popular attractions like Bhaja and Karla caves, paragliding hubs, and Pawna Lake, making it a perfect base for adventure, relaxation, and nature immersion just minutes from Lonavala’s core.

properties.title: Waterscape Phase 1
properties.description: Waterscape is an expansive, nature-inspired development offering premium farm plots and farm villas overlooking the serene backwaters of Panshet, nestled in the village of Pole, Velhe, Pune. Spanning over multiple phases across 115+ acres, the project offers a range of water-touch, water-view, mountain-view, and forest-view plots along with ready-to-build and prefab villa options. Designed to harmonize with the lush surroundings and pristine waterbodies, it is ideal for those seeking a countryside retreat, wellness living, or a sustainable investment.

location.name: Panshet, MH
location.description: Panshet, a hidden gem near Pune, makes an ideal nature‑blended micro‑market for getaway projects. Nestled in the Western Ghats around the Panshet Dam reservoir, it’s a peaceful retreat known for lush greenery, cascading waterfalls, and a charming village atmosphere. The dam and its backwaters are hubs for water activities boating, kayaking, jet‑skiing while nearby hiking and camping spots offer immersive hill‑station experiences. A growing collection of resorts, lakeside villas, and boutique homestays caters to both wellness‑focused travelers and weekenders seeking a serene escape . With its blend of outdoorsy adventure, quiet charm, and easy access from Pune, Panshet is an emerging hotspot for retreat‑oriented development near the city’s main real estate market.

location.name: Panshet, MH
location.description: Panshet, a hidden gem near Pune, makes an ideal nature‑blended micro‑market for getaway projects. Nestled in the Western Ghats around the Panshet Dam reservoir, it’s a peaceful retreat known for lush greenery, cascading waterfalls, and a charming village atmosphere. The dam and its backwaters are hubs for water activities boating, kayaking, jet‑skiing while nearby hiking and camping spots offer immersive hill‑station experiences. A growing collection of resorts, lakeside villas, and boutique homestays caters to both wellness‑focused travelers and weekenders seeking a serene escape . With its blend of outdoorsy adventure, quiet charm, and easy access from Pune, Panshet is an emerging hotspot for retreat‑oriented development near the city’s main real estate market.

properties.title: Konkan Trails
properties.description: Konkan Trails is a 51-acre themed village-living development that captures the essence of Konkan’s pristine beauty, rich biodiversity, and nostalgic charm. Designed with Climate-Responsive Architecture (CRA), the project harmonizes with the local topography, climate, and geography, offering a serene and authentic Konkani lifestyle. Located just 8 km from Dabhol and 18 km from Dapoli city, Konkan Trails features limited NA plots and villas with authentic design elements, making it an ideal choice for second homes or weekend retreats steeped in tradition.

location.name: Dapoli, MH

Local authorities support eco-tourism, enhancing regulatory comfort for investors. Land still trades below Alibaug levels, leaving room for appreciation.

location.name: Mulshi, MH
location.description: Mulshi, located near Pune, is a premium micro-market prized for its scenic lakeside settings, lush Western Ghats landscapes, and tranquil environment. It attracts buyers seeking luxury second homes, wellness retreats, and nature resorts away from the city bustle. With good connectivity via the Pune–Mumbai Expressway and expanding infrastructure, Mulshi combines natural beauty with accessibility. Growing demand for sustainable, leisure-focused developments positions Mulshi as a high-potential investment zone for lifestyle-driven real estate with strong appreciation prospects.

properties.title: Shantivan

Surrounded by lush landscapes and close to IT parks, townships, and wellness hubs, Shaantivan seamlessly combines work-life balance, wellness, and recreation perfect for CEOs and achievers seeking a meaningful escape without compromising on convenience.

location.name: Uruli Kanchan, MH
location.description: Uruli Kanchan, located east of Pune, is fast evolving into a high-potential micro-market within the Pune metropolitan region. Nestled along the Pune–Solapur highway with its own railway station, it offers seamless connectivity ideal for plotted developments and affordable housing. The area combines fertile agricultural surroundings with emerging gated communities, mid-range apartments, and a cluster of furniture manufacturers gaining traction among urban buyers . With NHAI planning underpasses to ease highway traffic, basic civic amenities in place, and proximity to Pune’s industrial and educational corridors, Uruli Kanchan presents a compelling opportunity for investors seeking early-entry value and steady capital appreciation

location.name: Talegaon, MH
location.description: Talegaon, nestled between Pune and Mumbai, offers a unique blend of natural serenity and urban connectivity. Surrounded by lush hills and enjoying a pleasant climate year-round, it has become a favored destination for those seeking a peaceful lifestyle close to city centers. Its strategic location ensures easy access to both Pune and Mumbai via expressways and railways, while the presence of educational institutions, healthcare facilities, and green open spaces adds to its appeal. With a balance of natural beauty and growing infrastructure, Talegaon is ideal for those looking to settle or invest in a well-connected yet tranquil environment.

properties.title: Nirvana Woods
properties.description:
Nirvana Woods is a boutique, gated enclave of just 20 exclusive forest plots, each 200 sq. yards, nestled in Bailparao, Ramnagar—minutes from Jim Corbett National Park. The project offers fully approved, freehold, ready-to-build land with flexible payment plans and all utilities in place. Residents enjoy access to a grand clubhouse with pool, yoga pavilion, nature trails, and 24x7 security. 
The location is ideal for weekend retreats, wellness escapes, or legacy homes, with high rental demand from eco-tourists and spiritual travelers. Each plot is positioned for privacy, forest views, and seamless access to green zones, making Nirvana Woods a rare opportunity for both end-users and investors seeking tranquility, appreciation, and income potential in Uttarakhand's most visited natural destination.

location.name: Bailparao, Ramnagar, UK
location.description:
Bailparao and Ramnagar are among Uttarakhand's most sought after micro-markets for second homes and holiday plots, thanks to their proximity to Jim Corbett National Park and robust eco-tourism demand. Land prices in the area have seen steady appreciation, with premium gated projects averaging ₹1,650–₹2,000/sq.ft. 
The region attracts investors, retirees, and families seeking tranquility, nature, and rental income. Low-density inventory, scenic surroundings, and excellent connectivity to Delhi and Nainital make it a top choice for both end-users and investors.

properties.title: Haridwar Greens
properties.description:
Haridwar Greens is a landmark integrated township in Roshnabad, Haridwar, spanning 50 acres with a mix of apartments, penthouses, and plots. Designed by B+H Architects (Canada), the project offers modern homes with large windows, sit-out decks, and imported marble flooring. Residents enjoy lush green landscapes, clubhouses, swimming pools, jogging tracks, gym, and playgrounds.
The township features wide internal roads, 24x7 security, power backup, and rainwater harvesting. Located near Rajaji National Park and major city hubs, Haridwar Greens combines comfort, sustainability, and spiritual vibrancy, making it ideal for families, retirees, and investors seeking value and tranquility in Haridwar's most organized sector.

location.name: Roshnabad, Haridwar, UK
location.description: Roshnabad is one of Haridwar's most rapidly developing micro-markets, known for its integrated townships, wide roads, and green surroundings. The area attracts families, retirees, and investors seeking affordable apartments and plots, with prices averaging ₹3,000–₹4,000/sq.ft for premium projects. Proximity to Rajaji National Park, educational institutions, and the industrial corridor boosts rental demand and capital appreciation. Modern amenities, organized layouts, and spiritual vibrancy make Roshnabad a top choice for long-term value and peaceful living.

properties.title: Excentia Tatva
properties.description:
Excentia Tatva is Dehradun’s first gold-rated green residential building, located on the prestigious Rajpur Road. This ultra-luxury, ultra low-density project offers just 307 exclusive 3 & 4 BHK residences across 5 acres, blending opulence with eco-conscious living. Homes are designed with biophilic architecture for abundant natural light, ventilation, and lush greenery. Residents enjoy over 100,000 sq.ft. of club and terrace amenities, including a spa, infinity pool, banquet, multi-cuisine restaurant, gym, private screening, and more. 
The development features a historic tree courtyard and wellness-focused spaces like yoga decks and healing gardens. With imported marble, VRV air conditioning, and up to 9 ft. wide balconies, every detail reflects luxury and comfort. The project’s prime location ensures proximity to top schools, hospitals, and malls, making it ideal for families, professionals, and investors seeking a refined lifestyle in Dehradun’s most coveted micro-market.

location.name: Rajpur Road, Dehradun, UK
location.description:
Rajpur Road is Dehradun’s most prestigious micro-market, known for luxury apartments, gated communities, and upscale amenities. The area attracts professionals, NRIs, and families seeking exclusivity and urban convenience. Property prices range from ₹12,000–₹18,000/sq.ft, reflecting strong demand and limited supply. 
Proximity to top schools, hospitals, and shopping centers enhances both rental and resale value. Ongoing infrastructure upgrades and the area’s green, pollution-free environment make it a magnet for end-users and investors. The micro-market’s blend of heritage, modernity, and scenic views ensures sustained capital appreciation and a premium lifestyle

properties.title: Avacasa
properties.description:
Avacasa is an exclusive enclave of 80 luxury villas nestled in the pristine Badkala Hills near Dehradun. Designed for discerning buyers seeking a second home, each villa features expansive layouts, double-height living spaces, private pools, and lush landscaped gardens. The project blends contemporary architecture with nature, offering panoramic 180° hill views and a suite of resort-style amenities.
Residents enjoy a secure, gated community with holistic wellness facilities, spa, and curated experiences. Avacasa stands out for its focus on sustainability, seamless connectivity via the Delhi-Dehradun Expressway, and a tranquil setting ideal for relaxation, wellness, and investment. Crafted for those who value privacy, design, and future appreciation, Avacasa redefines luxury living in Uttarakhand.

location.name: Badkala Hills, UK
location.description: Badkala Hills is emerging as a sought-after micro-market for luxury second homes and holiday villas, driven by its scenic landscapes, low-density inventory, and proximity to Dehradun. The area attracts HNIs, wellness seekers, and investors looking for tranquility, rental income, and capital appreciation. Typical property formats include independent villas and gated communities, with prices reflecting the exclusivity and premium amenities on offer. The region benefits from seamless connectivity to Delhi via the expressway, making it ideal for weekend getaways and long-term investment. Demand is fueled by the blend of nature, privacy, and modern infrastructure.

properties.title: Soul Prakriti
properties.description:
SOUL Prakriti is a 125-acre curated farmland community offering 143 exclusive plots of 600 sq. yards each, with the price including a fully constructed 1 BHK villa and private swimming pool. Located on the Haridwar-Najibabad Road, the project is designed for urban families and investors seeking a blend of rural tranquility and modern amenities. 
Residents enjoy themed zones—wellness gardens, adventure trails, organic farming patches, and eco-friendly infrastructure. The project delivers a unique lifestyle with over 100 amenities, sustainable landscaping, 24x7 security, and a vibrant community atmosphere. Its strategic location ensures seamless connectivity to Haridwar, making it ideal for weekend retreats, wellness escapes, and long-term investment in Uttarakhand’s thriving real estate market.

location.name: Haridwar, UK
location.description: Haridwar’s Patanjali corridor is a booming micro-market, driven by demand for premium villas, wellness homes, and gated communities. The area attracts families, retirees, and investors seeking proximity to Patanjali Yogpeeth, Har Ki Pauri, and Rajaji National Park. Prices for villas and apartments range from ₹3,000–₹5,000/sq.ft, with annual appreciation of 8–10%. The micro-market’s appeal is enhanced by improved connectivity via NH-58, upcoming expressways, and the influx of wellness tourism and spiritual seekers, making it ideal for both end-users and rental investors.

properties.title: The Club Farm
properties.description:
The Club Farm is a landmark 250-acre farmland enclave in the tranquil, spiritually significant landscape of Brijghat, Garh Mukteshwar. This exclusive development features spacious plots of 1210 sq. yards each, offering full land registry and mutation for assured legal ownership. The project’s core attraction is its innovative white sandalwood plantation concept, designed to deliver high-value, long-term returns for investors. Residents enjoy access to a 25-acre 5-star resort, a 5-acre Sanskar School, and a 5-acre wellness centre with yoga, Ayurveda, meditation, and more. 
Each owner is entitled to stay in the luxurious 25-acre resort for up to 30 days per year, blending investment with lifestyle and hospitality. Strategically located near the Ganga Expressway and Delhi-NCR, The Club Farm ensures seamless connectivity and future appreciation. With easy payment plans, immediate legal transfer, and a focus on multiple income streams, this project appeals to investors seeking security, passive income, and a healthy, spiritually enriched lifestyle.

properties.title: Brij Vrinda Farms & Resorts
properties.description:
Brij Vrinda Farms & Resorts is a 300-acre farmland project set in the heart of Vrindavan, offering 285 premium plots of 1,250 sq. yards each. This unique enclave blends spiritual heritage with modern eco-living, featuring white sandalwood plantations, a 25-acre luxury resort, a 5-acre wellness centre, and a Sanskar School for holistic education. 
The project guarantees instant registry and mutation, ensuring full legal ownership and peace of mind. Residents enjoy a secure, low-density community with over 100 amenities, sustainable landscaping, and direct access to the sacred Braj Chaurasi Kos Parikrama Marg. With proximity to the upcoming Noida International Airport and major expressways, Brij Vrinda is ideal for investors, families, and wellness seekers seeking legacy land, high returns, and a spiritually enriched lifestyle.

properties.title: Suraksha Enclave
properties.description:
Suraksha Enclave is a landmark 75-bigha (approx. 14-acre) smart villa township offering over 280 independent villas in the heart of Haridwar. Strategically located just behind Patanjali Yogpeeth and adjacent to NH-58, the project features ready-to-move 2 BHK and 3 BHK semi-furnished villas with elegant elevations, modern interiors, and quality finishes. Residents enjoy a secure, gated community with 3-tier security, wide roads, landscaped parks, and a host of smart amenities. 
The township is designed for families, professionals, and investors seeking a blend of spiritual ambiance, wellness, and urban convenience. With proximity to major educational institutions, hospitals, shopping, and the upcoming international airport, Suraksha Enclave stands out for its connectivity, infrastructure, and long-term value in Haridwar’s fastest-growing corridor.

properties.title: Harilok Green
properties.description:
Harilok Greens is a premier real estate project nestled in the tranquil locale of Sehdev Pur, near Patanjali Yogpeeth, Phase 1, Haridwar. Offering residential and commercial plots starting at just ₹20 Lacs for 1000 sq ft, this meticulously designed community combines modern amenities with the spiritual essence of Haridwar. 
The project features a 30 ft wide road, gated society, sewage line, CCTV surveillance, parks, a yoga center, and a community area, ensuring a secure and peaceful lifestyle. Residents of Harilok Green will enjoy proximity to renowned spiritual and tourist attractions, including the sacred Har Ki Pauri, Mansa Devi Temple, and the tranquil Rajaji National Park. The project is conveniently located near the Jolly Grant Airport, prestigious schools, and colleges, making it an ideal choice for families and professionals alike.

properties.title: Adiyogi Haridwar
properties.description:
Adiyogi Haridwar is a modern, RERA and HRDA approved villa township spread across 15 acres in the heart of Haridwar. The project offers over 280 independent 2 BHK and 3 BHK semi-furnished villas and residential plots, each designed for families, professionals, and investors seeking a blend of spiritual ambiance, wellness, and urban convenience. Located just behind Patanjali Yogpeeth and adjacent to NH-334, residents enjoy easy access to the upcoming international airport, metro, and top schools. 
The township features landscaped parks, meditation centers, club house, daily needs store, and 3-tier security, all within a secure, gated community. With proximity to Crystal World Water Park, Sarovar Portico Hotel, and major city landmarks, Adiyogi Haridwar stands out for its connectivity, infrastructure, and long-term value in Haridwar’s fastest-growing corridor. The focus on wellness, spirituality, and modern amenities makes it a unique investment for both end-users and investors.

properties.title: KP Hills
properties.description: KP Hills is a premium residential plot project nestled in the tranquil hills of Ranikhet, Uttarakhand. Spanning 10 acres, the development offers 48 spacious plots of 300 sq. yards each, ideal for second-home buyers and nature lovers seeking Himalayan serenity. Each plot is residential-approved, with easy road access, water and electricity connections, and proximity to local markets and amenities. The project is designed for those who value a peaceful lifestyle, panoramic valley views, and fresh mountain air. KP Hills ensures a secure, low-density community, making it a perfect investment for building your dream home or holiday retreat in one of Uttarakhand’s most sought-after destinations. The project’s focus on exclusivity, sustainability, and wellness makes it a rare opportunity for discerning investors and families.

location.name: Ranikhet, UK
location.description: Ranikhet is a tranquil cantonment town celebrated for its lush pine forests, colonial-era charm, and sweeping views of the Himalayas. As a micro market, Ranikhet is favored by investors and holiday home buyers for its pollution-free environment, proximity to top attractions like Upat Golf Course and Chaubatia Gardens, and robust infrastructure. The presence of reputed schools, army establishments, and upcoming airport connectivity further boost its appeal. Ranikhet’s property market is characterized by limited supply and high demand, ensuring strong rental yields and capital appreciation for discerning buyers.

properties.title: Claridge's Residency
properties.description:
Claridge's Residency is a premium holiday home project located in Bharari, Shimla. The project features 4 towers with 4 floors each, offering 43 fully furnished apartments ranging from 1 BHK studios to 3 BHK sky villas. Designed for those seeking a serene mountain retreat, the residences offer stunning valley and cedar forest views, modern interiors, and high-quality finishes. 
Residents enjoy amenities such as a clubhouse, gymnasium, high-speed internet, power backup, and 24x7 security. The project is strategically located just 2 km from The Mall, Shimla, providing easy access to city conveniences while offering a peaceful lifestyle amidst nature.

properties.title: Sneh Homes
properties.description:
Sneh Homes is a boutique plotted development spread across 3.5 acres in the peaceful Virplyasi locality of Solan. The project offers 55 well-planned residential plots, each measuring 29 x 58 sq.ft (1,682 sq.ft), ideal for building custom homes in a serene Himalayan setting. Designed for families, second-home seekers, and investors, the layout features wide 7.5m internal roads, landscaped green areas, a dedicated gym and health center, community hall, and ample parking. 
Residents benefit from modern infrastructure including stormwater collection, fresh water lines, sewerage, and electrical connections. With clear titles, flexible payment plans, and proximity to Solan’s top schools, hospitals, and markets, Sneh Homes is a rare opportunity for secure, tranquil living or investment in one of Himachal’s most promising micro-markets.

properties.title: Auramah Valley
properties.description:
Auramah Valley is Himachal’s largest luxury estate, spanning 43 acres in the pristine Naldhera hills near Shimla. This award-winning project offers 2 and 3 BHK ultra-luxury apartments and penthouses with panoramic Himalayan views. Each home is crafted for discerning buyers seeking tranquility, world-class hospitality, and architectural excellence. Residents enjoy a curated lifestyle with a heated pool, spa, tennis, golf access, gourmet dining, and a helicopter club. 
The community is managed by hospitality veterans from Oberoi and Taj, ensuring five-star services, 24x7 security, and seamless property management. Sustainability, wellness, and social harmony are at the core, making Auramah Valley a rare blend of legacy investment, lifestyle, and natural beauty. The estate’s RERA approval, freehold title, and robust infrastructure guarantee long-term value and peace of mind.

location.name: Naldhera, HP
location.description:
Naldhera is Shimla’s most exclusive micro-market, renowned for its lush golf course, pine forests, and tranquil environment. The area attracts HNIs, second-home buyers, and wellness seekers, offering luxury estates and premium apartments with panoramic mountain views. 
Property prices in Naldhera range from ₹9,000–₹12,000/sq.ft, with steady appreciation driven by limited inventory, tourism, and proximity to Shimla. The region’s clean air, scenic beauty, and robust infrastructure make it a top choice for legacy homes and high-yield rentals.

properties.title: Hari Ashray Nagar
properties.description:
Hari Ashray is Haridwar’s largest HRDA & RERA-approved integrated township, spread over 350 acres near Patanjali Yogpeeth on NH-58. Home to over 1500 families, this secure, well-planned enclave offers a choice of freehold plots (100–250 sq. yards), studio apartments (260 sq.ft), and spacious 3BHK flats (1200 sq.ft), catering to investors, families, and second-home seekers. With 30-ft wide roads, 24x7 water, electricity, and CCTV security, lush green parks, children’s zones, and two temples, Hari Ashray delivers a quality lifestyle with all modern amenities. 
Residents enjoy healthy, pollution-free surroundings, community spaces, school, shops, and seamless connectivity to Haridwar, Roorkee, SIDCUL, and Har-Ki-Pauri. The township’s strong rental potential, affordable pricing from ₹30,000/sq. yard, full legal approvals, and professionally managed facilities make it Haridwar’s top investment and end-use destination.

location.description:
Patanjali’s micro-market in Haridwar is among Uttarakhand’s fastest growing zones, driven by SIT-SIDCUL, Patanjali Yogpeeth, and entry on NH-58 corridor. The area appeals to families, professionals, and investors seeking secure plots, villas, and modern apartments.

With 24x7 security, pollution-free environment, good schools, and strong rental demand from nearby industrial hub and spiritual tourism, Patanjali offers robust capital appreciation, rental yield, and lifestyle value.

properties.title: The Whispering Pines
properties.description:
The Whispering Pines is a boutique gated community spread across 4 pristine acres in the pine-draped hills of Kumarhatti, Solan. The project offers 94 meditative apartments (studios, 2 & 3 BHK) and 12 distinct villas, blending affordable luxury with contemporary mountain design. Overlooking 56 hectares of protected forest, each home features expansive valley and forest views, high ceilings, wooden floors, and glass-clad facades that let in the serene mountain light. 
For urban families and second-home seekers, the property delivers both lifestyle and rental potential, complemented by a dedicated management team for seamless upkeep and guest management. Residents enjoy exclusive access to a clubhouse, wellness lounge, stargazing decks, bonfire gazebos, landscaped gardens, and modern conveniences. RERA-approved for all buyers and just 1.8 km from NH-5, The Whispering Pines is tailor-made for nature lovers seeking a tranquil escape, future appreciation, and a holistic lifestyle in Himachal.

properties.title: Chalet Estate
properties.description:
Chalet Estate is a premium fully-furnished apartment community spread across 1.2 acres in the serene pine-draped hills of Kasauli. Approved under RERA and open to both Himachali and Non-Himachali buyers, the estate offers 78 thoughtfully designed residences including studio, 1 BHK, and 3 BHK apartments. Each home comes fully equipped with beds, linen, modular kitchen, furnishings, Smart TV, heating/cooling appliances, and modern gadgets — perfect for second-home use, rentals, or investment. 
The development features a luxurious clubhouse with restaurant, spa, gym, kids play zone, and library, all surrounded by forest views and cool mountain breezes. Strategically located 28 km from Solan and 56 km from Chandigarh Airport, Chalet Estate offers unmatched comfort and capital appreciation in one of Himachal’s most aspirational micro-markets.

location.name: Mashobra, HP
location.description:
Mashobra is a premium and tranquil micro-market near Shimla, renowned for its pine forests, orchards, and cool climate. It attracts high-end buyers, wellness-focused residents, and vacation seekers looking for exclusive second homes or rental assets.

properties.title: Chail Heights Villas
properties.description:
Chail Heights Villas is a 15-acre boutique development set amidst the pine forests and rolling hills of Chail, Solan. Designed as a tranquil retreat, the project features 174 thoughtfully planned 1 BHK apartments (855 & 977 sq.ft) with balconies for panoramic Himalayan views, and ultra-luxury 2819 sq.ft Duplex villas for those seeking exclusivity and space. Each home offers a harmonious blend of comfort, modern interiors, and full furniture options, ideal for both vacation living and year-round residence. 
Project amenities include a clubhouse (kids play area, pool table, beverages corner), gym, landscaped gardens, fire security, and dedicated parking for every apartment. RERA-approved and freehold, Chail Heights guarantees secure investment, transparency, and lasting value in a fast-growing hill destination.

properties.title: Harisons Homes

Spread across 8.4 acres, this thoughtfully planned project comprises 93 apartments in multi-storey Blocks 1, 2 & 3, featuring fully ventilated layouts, private balconies, and scenic valley views. With modern plans, secure entry, and essential shops onsite, Harisons Homes is ideal for first-time buyers, rental investors, and those seeking serene living in the green Himachali hills near Solan.

properties.title: Mangoa – Sindhura Farms
properties.description: MANGOA by Nest Properties is a 7-acre managed farmland project in Magadi, Bengaluru, offering premium mango orchard plots ranging from 6,000 sq.ft up to 2 acres. Designed for urban families, investors, and wellness seekers, each plot comes with mature mango, teak, and neem trees, with the option for a fully constructed cottage as part of a ₹45 lakh package. The project features wide internal roads, solar street lighting, water connection to each plot, 24x7 CCTV surveillance, and on-site workers for maintenance. location.name: Magadi, KA

properties.title: Swargam
properties.description: Swargam by Nivashan Group is Bengaluru’s only luxury managed farmland enclave within city limits, spanning 7 acres and offering just 50 exclusive plots starting from 6,000 sq.ft. This project is designed for elite families and discerning investors seeking a blend of urban connectivity and serene rural living. Located just 8 km from Tavarekere and under GBA/BDA jurisdiction, Swargam features a grand gated entrance, 30 ft wide asphalted roads, and a 20,000 sq.ft luxury clubhouse with yoga deck, indoor-outdoor lounges, and complimentary stays for plot owners. Residents enjoy a natural freshwater stream, kayaking, fishing, cycling trails, Wi-Fi zones, and mature mango orchards. Every plot comes with clear, registerable titles and access to managed farming options, making Swargam ideal for organic farming, weekend retreats, eco-homes, or Airbnb income. The community is crafted for sustainability, wellness, and legacy living, with immediate registration and hassle-free documentation.

location.name: Tavarekere, KA
location.description: Tavarekere is an emerging micro-market in northwest Bengaluru blending city connectivity with rural charm, just minutes from NICE Road, STRR, and upcoming metro stations. Known for its lush landscapes, mature orchards, and abundance of resort and farmhouse communities, Tavarekere attracts Bengaluru's urban professionals, wealth planners, and nature lovers. Typical property formats range from managed farmland plots to integrated farm villas, averaging ₹1,800–₹2,200 per sq.ft. The area’s strategic location under BDA/GBA limits, new infrastructure, and proximity to industrial and IT hubs fuel steady demand from both lifestyle and investment buyers.

properties.title: A Walk in the Clouds
properties.description: A Walk in the Clouds by SBC Earthfulness is a 40-acre hillside managed farmland community just 5 minutes from Denkanikottai, crafted for urban families and nature lovers seeking a peaceful retreat close to Bengaluru. This eco-conscious, low-density enclave offers just 160 premium plots (10,000 sq.ft onwards) with the freedom to build your dream farmhouse or weekend home. Residents enjoy 30,000 sq.ft of curated community space—featuring a goshala, modern clubhouse with swimming pool, yoga decks, gazebos, butterfly and herbal gardens, and serene walking and cycling trails. The project is thoughtfully laid out across three immersive zones (Sky, Air, Earth) with a central spine road, reflecting natural land contours and inviting relaxation at every turn. Emphasizing sustainability and harmony, every plot offers the benefits of managed plantations, bio-diverse landscaping, water retention ponds, and modern amenities, making it an ideal address for families, investors, and wellness seekers who want a legacy land asset amid nature.

properties.title: Dhatri Sandal Farms

With strong infrastructure, proximity to the proposed SEZ, and land appreciation, Dhatri Sandal Farms offers investors tax-free returns and the unique pride of owning managed timber-producing land.

Centered around the scenic tiered Kune Falls, the area benefits from rich natural appeal and hill-station charm . location.name: Dapoli, MH
location.description: Dapoli, on Maharashtra’s Konkan coast, offers pristine beaches, ancient caves and famous Alphonso mango orchards. Improved Mumbai–Goa highway links have sparked second-home interest from Pune and Mumbai buyers. Boutique resorts and homestays earn healthy holiday-season rentals. Local authorities support eco-tourism, enhancing regulatory comfort for investors. Land still trades below Alibaug levels, leaving room for appreciation.

location.name: Kothimbe, MH
location.description: Kothimbe lies on the periphery of Karjat’s developing tourism and second-home circuit. Surrounded by hills, fields, and small water bodies, it offers ideal conditions for wellness-focused developments and plotted communities. The village benefits from its proximity to tourist routes while remaining insulated from Karjat’s main town congestion—making it attractive for nature-first, low-footprint real estate concepts.

location.name: Wagholi , MH
location.description: Wagholi is a fast-growing micro-market on Pune’s eastern edge, attracting buyers and investors due to its proximity to major IT hubs like Kharadi and Hadapsar. Known for affordable housing options and developing social infrastructure including schools, healthcare, and retail it serves as a key residential catchment for professionals working in Pune’s tech corridors. While current connectivity challenges exist, upcoming metro extensions and road projects are set to enhance accessibility, solidifying Wagholi’s position as a strategic micro-market within Pune’s expanding real estate landscape

properties.title: Viroha

Designed as a unique themed community, it brings a blend of luxury, leisure, and tranquility close to Mumbai.

location.name: Dahanu, MH
location.description: Dahanu, in Maharashtra’s Palghar district, is emerging as a promising micro-market for real estate investment. Its serene coastal setting, proximity to Mumbai, and affordable land options make it ideal for second homes and long-term appreciation. Major infrastructure projects like the Vadhavan Port and Virar–Dahanu rail expansion are set to boost regional connectivity and economic activity, positioning Dahanu as a strategic destination for early-stage investors seeking growth beyond Mumbai’s saturated markets.

Infrastructure includes internal paved roads, 24×7 water supply, sewage treatment, closed‑car parking, street lighting, power backup, firefighting systems, and CCTV/security .Common areas such as the clubhouse, pool, mini‑theatre, gym, river‑side café, and landscaped gardens—are professionally maintained. location.name: Hadashi, MH
location.description: Hadashi, is a rising micro-market ideal for plotted developments, boutique getaways, and nature-integrated projects. Nestled near Hadashi Lake and temple, surrounded by Western Ghats hills and greenery, it attracts weekenders and retreat seekers . The village benefits from basic rural infrastructure paved roads, bus access, and community amenities plus proximity to Pune via Paud and Mumbai–Pune Old Highway routes.

properties.title: AMK Hills
properties.description: AMK Hills is a premium NA bungalow plot community nestled amidst the Sahyadri ranges in Igatpuri. Spread across 18 acres, the project is uniquely crafted around a serene dam backwater setting, offering spectacular mountain and valley views. Located just 9 km from NH3 and 8 km from the Samruddhi Mahamarg Interchange, it ensures seamless connectivity from Mumbai (130 km), Pune (240 km), and Nashik (43 km). Perfect for nature lovers, weekend getaways, or spiritual retreats, AMK Hills provides the ideal canvas to build your dream villa amid lush greenery and peaceful landscapes.

location.name: Igatpuri, MH
location.description: Igatpuri is a hill station located in the Western Ghats of Maharashtra, known for its scenic beauty and cool climate. With increasing tourism and demand for luxury retreats, it is becoming a prime location for real estate investment. properties.title: Fireflies
properties.description: Fireflies is a thoughtfully designed, luxurious NA bungalow plot and villa community located near Bhavli Dam in Igatpuri, one of Maharashtra’s most scenic hill stations. Spread across 25 acres, the project blends serene natural beauty with modern infrastructure, offering a peaceful escape from urban chaos. With its panoramic views, cool weather, and strategic location just 130 km from Mumbai, 43 km from Nashik, and 240 km from Pune, Fireflies is ideal for a weekend retreat, holiday home, or investment property. The project’s vision combines sustainability with comfort, ensuring a lifestyle of harmony, wellness, and long-term value.

properties.title: Estancia
properties.description: Agami Estancia is a premium villa community that brings the charm and elegance of classic Spanish architecture to modern India. Designed as both a luxury residence and a holiday home, this gated enclave features spacious 3 and 5 BHK villas set amidst lush landscaped surroundings. From ornate exteriors to indulgent interiors, every villa reflects grandeur, comfort, and intelligent design — perfect for those who value both lifestyle and legacy. With plot sizes ranging from 3,200 to 4,500 sq.ft and exclusive features like double-height living spaces, organic gardens, plunge pools, and sun decks, Agami Estancia offers a truly elevated way of living.

location.name: Boisar , MH
location.description: Boisar, in Maharashtra’s Palghar district, is a rapidly emerging micro-market, anchored by one of the largest MIDC industrial zones and the Tarapur Atomic Power Station. With its railway connection to Mumbai and upcoming high-speed bullet train station, plus road links via the Delhi–Mumbai Industrial Corridor and Mumbai–Vadodara Expressway, Boisar offers strong transit accessibility.As infrastructure projects and industrial expansion continue, Boisar presents a compelling early-entry opportunity for investors targeting affordable homes with long-term capital appreciation potential on Mumbai’s expanding periphery.

properties.title: Lake Serene
properties.description: Lake Serene by Trambak Buildcon is an exclusive, 5-acre development offering 54 premium NA plots in a peaceful location facing Ranjanpada Lake. With plot areas ranging from 2,400 sq.ft. to 6,500 sq.ft., this project combines serene lake views with easy access to popular beaches such as Mahim Beach (8 minutes) and Kelve Beach (15 minutes). Located just 6 km from Palghar railway station, Lake Serene offers a tranquil, nature-inspired environment, making it ideal for weekend getaways, second homes, or investment properties.

location.name: Palghar, MH
location.description: Palghar, as a micro-market, is gaining traction due to its affordability, proximity to Mumbai, and growing infrastructure. Located along the Western Railway line and part of the Delhi–Mumbai Industrial Corridor (DMIC), it benefits from strong connectivity and government-backed industrial growth. With serene beaches, ample green cover, and planned urbanization, Palghar is attracting demand for weekend homes, plotted developments, and rental housing linked to nearby MIDC zones. Its blend of nature, affordability, and future-ready infrastructure positions it as a rising real estate destination on Mumbai’s extended suburban belt.

location.name: Chendhare, MH
location.description: Chendhare, Alibag is quietly emerging as a promising destination for second homes and boutique developments. Located just minutes from Alibag town and close to the upcoming Alibag–Revas coastal road and Ro-Ro ferry terminal, Chendhare offers a mix of accessibility and tranquillity. Its scenic surroundings, proximity to beaches like Varsoli and Akshi, and relatively lower land costs compared to central Alibag make it attractive for early-stage investment in villas, homestays, and lifestyle plots. It’s an ideal pocket for buyers seeking nature-led living with future growth upside.

location.name: Gotheghar, MH
location.description: Nestled just east of Alibag town, Gotheghar is a quiet coastal hamlet gaining early-stage investor interest..The village offers peaceful surroundings and basic rural amenities. Its close proximity to Alibag and emerging zoning corridors, plus small-scale residential developments, make it suitable for plotted layouts, boutique stays, and weekend homes. As Alibag sees growing spillover demand, Gotheghar stands out as a tranquil yet accessible pocket offering affordable entry and future upside.

properties.title: Arogya Vana
properties.description: Arogya Vana by Saptha Ventures is a 20-acre managed farmland project in Chagaluru (near Lepakshi, Andhra Pradesh), offering fully managed farm plots starting from 5,000 sq.ft . Designed for urban investors, families, and sustainability enthusiasts, each plot is curated with a unique 3-layer farming model. The project features zero maintenance for two years, lifetime ownership, and a guaranteed buy-back policy with up to 100% appreciation in 5 years. Secure, eco-friendly, and completely managed by Saptha Ventures, Arogya Vana emphasizes hassle-free ownership, profit-sharing, and the creation of a self-sustaining, healthy living environment just off the Bengaluru-Hyderabad highway.

location.name: Lepakshi
location.description: Lepakshi, just north of Bengaluru, is witnessing rapid demand for managed farm plots and eco-communities—driven by proximity to NH-44, fertile soil, water availability, and greenfield infrastructure. Typical buyers include Bengaluru professionals, NRI families, and legacy investors seeking secure, legal plots for long-term appreciation and tax-free income. Rates for managed farmlands in Lepakshi are rising, with projects here commanding ₹200–₹350/sq.ft and capital appreciation of 8–12% per annum. Region benefits from new SEZs, highway growth, and spillover from Bengaluru IT/industrial expansion.

properties.title: Highland Park
properties.description:
Highland Park is a luxury group housing project located near Prem Nagar Ashram Chowk, Nirmal Bagh, Kankhal, Haridwar. Spread across 1.1 acres, this RERA, HRDA, and Green-Building certified development comprises 80 semi-furnished 3 & 4 BHK apartments (1,500–2,000 sq.ft), designed with wide balconies, extensive light, and top-notch finishes. 
Each home is fitted with modular kitchen, ACs, wardrobes, TVs, geysers, lights, tiles, UPVC windows, and safety doors. The building features 2 floors of parking, 4 lifts, landscaped park, and 24x7 security. Located just 100m from NH-334 and 1 km from bus and railway stations, with Ganga Ghats only 50m away, Highland Park offers unmatched lifestyle and spiritual proximity.

location.name: Kankhal, Haridwar, UK
location.description: Kankhal is one of Haridwar’s most sought-after micro-markets, known for its spiritual importance, proximity to Har Ki Pauri, and high livability index. properties.title: Palm Springs
properties.description:
Palm Springs is a premium residential project spread across 0.51 acres in Kankhal, Haridwar, offering 72 Ganga-facing 2 & 3 BHK luxury apartments. Strategically located opposite Pilot Baba Ashram and just 7 km from Har Ki Pauri, each unit offers sweeping views of the Ganga river and forested hills. Thoughtfully designed with expansive balconies, quality finishes, and Vaastu-compliant layouts, this HRDA and RERA-approved property blends tranquility with urban convenience. 
Residents enjoy 20+ resort-like amenities including clubhouse, gym, sun deck, kids play zone, rooftop yoga, spa, swimming pool, and secured basement parking. Perfect for families, investors, and spiritual settlers, Palm Springs ensures high capital growth, rental income, and emotional value.

properties.title: Imperial Valley
properties.description:
Imperial Valley is a neo-classic MDDA-approved plotted and villa community across 10 acres in Thano—just 7 minutes from Jolly Grant Airport, Dehradun. Surrounded by rich flora, 360° Himalayan views, and dense reserve forest, the estate features only 74 plots (from 1800–2700 sq.ft), each with direct access to wide internal roads, modern infrastructure, and secure entry points. 
This eco-sensitive development promises luxury, comfort, and strong ROI through proximity to major expressways, future medical and sports hubs, Rishikesh, and Haridwar. With parks, clubhouse, children’s play zones, and high-end civic amenities, Imperial Valley is designed for end-users, NRI buyers, and long-term investors seeking legal clarity and wellness-focused living moments from Uttarakhand’s spiritual and tourism core.

properties.title: Mega County
properties.description:
Mega County is a premium apartment community set on the scenic Mussoorie-Dehradun highway, spread across 1.47 acres with 119 apartments. The project offers 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments designed for spacious living, coupled with panoramic views of the Shivaliks and premium construction quality. 
Residents benefit from a fully equipped clubhouse, health club, yoga zones, landscaped gardens, and kids’ play areas in an exclusive low-rise gated environment. With completion certificate in place and prime proximity to top schools, hospitals, and shopping hubs, Mega County offers luxury living with strong investment credibility.

properties.title: NS Alti Level
properties.description:
NS Altilevel is a landmark residential development spanning 5 acres in the premium locality of Champasari, Siliguri. The project offers 420 vastu-compliant homes across 6 - G+10 towers designed around multi-level landscaping and biophilic urban living. With 52% open space and a G+2 clubhouse packed with luxurious amenities, the community brings together green spaces, active zones, and wellness hubs to serve all age groups. 
NS Altilevel features IGBC gold-level green certification (under process), over 20 curated theme zones, and smart community mobility. The development is strategically located next to major schools, malls, healthcare, and just minutes from NJP Railway Station and Bagdogra Airport — making it Siliguri’s finest large-scale housing enclave near the green belt.

properties.title: BDS Eternia
properties.description:
BDS Eternia is a new-age residential and commercial project on Siliguri’s Eastern Bypass, offering 142 spacious 3BHK flats (1,358–1,582 sq.ft) and 21 commercial spaces in a B+G+8 twin-tower layout. Featuring 60% open space, well-designed layouts, dedicated balconies, and modern architecture, the project is conceived for city families seeking a harmony of tradition, comfort, and work-life balance. 
Residents enjoy exclusive access to 40+ amenities like swimming pool, A/C gym, banquet hall, party lawns, rooftop sports, yoga/meditation zone, and individual covered car parking, all in a well-landscaped, centrally located campus. Next to Spencer's, opposite the upcoming ITC, and with excellent school/market/hospital access, BDS Eternia is Siliguri’s signature address for buyers who want urban luxury and community living with robust infrastructure, RERA approval, and flexible payment plans.

location.name: Eastern Bypass, Siliguri, WB
location.description: Eastern Bypass is Siliguri’s fastest-emerging micro-market, linking the city center to NJP, the ISKCON Corridor, and commercial urban infrastructure. The area attracts new-gen buyers for its open, traffic-free environment, easy market/school/hospital reach, upcoming IT hub, and 5–10% annual value growth. Apartments here offer ready rental and resale opportunity, supported by abundant open space, new amenities and retail.

properties.title: Beaumonde Siliguri
properties.description:
Beaumonde is Siliguri’s tallest and most luxurious sky residence project, spread over 12.3 acres in the heart of the city. Soaring towers with iconic skyline views offer 3, 4, and exclusive 5 BHK apartments with private decks, double-height living zones, and seamless smart-home automation. Residences range from 2,756–4,111 sq.ft (3 BHK), 4,176–4,465 sq.ft (4 BHK), and a limited 5 BHK penthouse at 10,014 sq.ft, all finished to international standards with panoramic windows, premium fittings, and designer kitchens. 
Residents enjoy Siliguri’s only sky lounge, club house, infinity pool, banquet, high-tech gym, mini golf, triple-height lobby, and 24x7 concierge. Centrally located near City Center, Bagdogra Airport, and top hospitals and schools, Beaumonde offers unparalleled connectivity, amenities, and capital appreciation potential in the upcoming star micro-market of Eastern India.

properties.title: Gulmohar Villas
properties.description:
Gulmohar Villas is an exclusive gated community spanning 6 acres, offering 154 premium 4 BHK independent villas spread across the serene locale. Each villa boasts spacious 1,812 sq.ft of modern living space designed for comfortable family living with luxury finishes. The project is perfect for discerning homebuyers and investors seeking privacy combined with access to natural surroundings and urban convenience. 
Residents will enjoy well-planned layouts, lush green open spaces, and quality construction with all modern amenities. Strategic location with smooth connectivity and proximity to key city centers enhances lifestyle and investment value.

location.name: Sakleshpur , KA
location.description: Sakleshpur is a hill station nestled in the biodiverse Western Ghats of Karnataka, known for its coffee plantations, heavy rainfall, and growing homestay tourism. With excellent groundwater availability and dense forest cover, the region is seeing rising interest from Bengaluru and Mangalore-based buyers looking to invest in lifestyle farmland and eco-retreats. Sakleshpur's strategic location along NH 75 (Mangalore Highway) adds to its real estate value proposition.

properties.title: Sri Vinayaka Farmlands
properties.description: Sri Vinayaka Farmlands & Villas offers an idyllic escape for those looking to invest in managed agricultural land near Bengaluru. Located just 2 km from NH4 near Vaddahalli on the Kolar–Tirupati Highway, this 6000+ sq.ft micro-farm model comes bundled with a 4-year-old mango plantation (30 trees), 10 assorted fruit trees, and your choice of a cottage. With complimentary microgreen pods, solar lighting, water supply, and free maintenance for 2 years, the project ensures passive returns and sustainable wellness living. The site also features a farmstay experience, mud homes, A-frame cottages, and a Goshala – perfect for weekend retreats or long-term eco-investment.

location.name: Vaddahalli (Kolar), KA
location.description: Vaddahalli is an upcoming micro-market off the NH4 Kolar-Tirupati corridor, recognized for its easy Bengaluru access, natural settings, and strong demand for managed farmland products. The region’s clear land titles, improved roads, and soil/water availability make it a favored eco-living and second-home destination for urban buyers. Price trends range ₹350–₹500/sq.ft, outperforming due to limited curated inventory and health/wellness appeal.

properties.title: Tarini
properties.description: Tarini by Greensiri is a luxury 45-acre managed farmland opportunity near Lepakshi, designed for city dwellers seeking passive income, sustainable living, and a peaceful natural escape just 90 minutes from Bengaluru Airport. Buyers own a 5,250 sq.ft freehold plot, receive a fully-furnished 600 sq.ft cottage with kitchenette, and enjoy lifetime clubhouse membership and monthly guaranteed income of ₹20,000. The gated estate features 2-acre clubhouse, amphitheater, nature canal, organic farming, picket fencing, and your choice of mango, timber, multicropping, or custom plantations. With end-to-end maintenance, land appreciation, buyback support, and 20+ modern amenities, Tarini delivers a true live-earn-relax model for families and investors. Limited-period offer only for select plots.

location.name: Lepakshi, KA
location.description: Lepakshi is a fast-emerging nature investment zone located just beyond the Karnataka-Andhra border, offering proximity to NH 544E and industrial zones like KIA Motors. With historic landmarks and a serene rural backdrop, Lepakshi appeals to those looking for second homes, farm retreats, and long-term land investments near Bengaluru.

properties.title: Vootla Farms
properties.description: Vootla Farms is a 26-acre premium managed farmland community in Athimugam, Hosur, just an hour from Bengaluru and surrounded by 1,000 acres of forest reserve. The project features 71 exclusive plots (10,000–18,000 sq.ft), each delivered with 24/7 security, customized permaculture plantation, private picket fencing, bio fencing, and landscaping. Residents enjoy a 40+ amenity resort enclave including a clubhouse, bio pool, farm-to-table dining, cottages, amphitheatre, Miyawaki forest, and butterfly arcade. Every plot comes with a fully managed option—natural farming, drip irrigation, seasonal crops/fruits, and a lifelong clubhouse membership. With an abundance of green zones, curated biodiversity, and extensive wellness & recreation, Vootla Farms is designed for sustainable living, passive income, and legacy family retreats within close proximity to Bengaluru.

location.name: Athimugam (Hosur)
location.description: Athimugam and the Hosur–Sarjapur belt are emerging as Bengaluru’s top managed farmland micro-markets, offering scenic value, rich biodiversity, and easy highway access. Demand is driven by city professionals, NRIs, and wellness-seekers seeking secure plots with lifestyle/legacy returns. Limited legal, curated inventories and sustainable design have driven 14%+ YoY price appreciation in recent years.

properties.title: Amruta
properties.description: Amruta by Mytan Farms is a 75-acre luxury managed farmland development near Neralekunte, pioneered by IIM alumni. With just 157 curated plots (10,000–18,000 sq.ft), the project blends wealth creation and sustainability by offering fully-managed three-layer agro-farming (including sandalwood, teak, rosewood, fruit, and future seasonal crops) and high-density dragon fruit farming. Residents enjoy an expansive 180,000 sq.ft. clubhouse, swimming pools, furnished studio rooms, work-from-farm spaces, organic gardens, children's play zones, yoga deck, Go-Shala, and on-site farm support. Amruta is professionally managed with security, irrigation, and maintenance are completely handled - making it an ideal asset for passive income, weekend retreats, and family legacy. Located just 1.5 hours from Bengaluru International Airport and close to Hindupur IT/industrial clusters, Amruta offers exceptional connectivity, green living, and robust future appreciation.

location.name: Neralekunte
location.description: Neralekunte, in Bengaluru North, is a rapidly appreciating micro-market due to proximity to Hindupur IT and textile parks, 1,600-acre SEZ, multiple lakes, and new rail/road infrastructure. Legal farm plots and managed communities here attract urban professionals seeking green investments and regulated, high-yield land—current pricing in managed projects: ₹200–₹300/sq.ft, annual appreciation ~11%.

properties.title: Meraki Farms
properties.description: Meraki is an exclusive farm plot development set amidst the scenic landscapes of Pali in Raigad district, surrounded by the lush Sahyadri ranges. Spread across 28 acres, this thoughtfully designed gated community offers half-acre (21,780+ sq.ft.) farm plots, ideal for weekend homes, nature retreats, or long-term land investment. With a serene countryside vibe and excellent accessibility to both Mumbai and Pune (just 1.5 hours by drive), Meraki combines the charm of rural living with urban proximity. It’s the perfect destination for those seeking peace, privacy, and connection to nature whether to build a second home, farmhouse, or a self-sustained getaway.

location.name: Pali, MH
location.description: Pali, a quiet town in Raigad, Maharashtra, offers a peaceful and serene environment perfect for weekend homes and retirement living. The region is growing in popularity for real estate investments due to its proximity to Mumbai and Pune, making it an attractive location for second homes and weekend retreats. The area benefits from low population density, clean air, and scenic views, making it ideal for those seeking a break from urban life.

properties.title: Tre Aqua
properties.description: Tre Aqua is a premium gated community spread across 25 acres in the serene, misty hills of Igatpuri, Maharashtra also called the "Fog City." Surrounded by three majestic water bodies (Waki, Vaitarna, Mukane lakes), this project offers lake-facing plots starting from 3,000 sq. ft. The development features ready infrastructure and wellness-driven design, offering buyers the chance to build luxury homes in one of Maharashtra’s most scenic tourist hubs. Located just 130 km from Mumbai via the Mumbai-Nashik Highway, Tre Aqua is ideal for nature lovers and second home investors alike.

location.name: Shahapur, MH
location.description: Shahpur is an emerging countryside zone attracting plotted development, farm stays, and boutique retreats near Karjat and Titwala. With lush landscapes, forested hills, and riverine terrain, it appeals to investors seeking nature-driven projects within the Mumbai Metropolitan Region . Shahpur benefits from proximity to the Panvel–Karjat railway corridor under construction, enhancing suburban rail access and encouraging weekend-home investment .

properties.title: Villa Amara 30
properties.description: Villa Amara 30 is a rare opportunity to own a fully furnished 3BHK private pool villa in the upscale Tungarli village of Lonavala. properties.title: Good Earth Vineyards
properties.description: Good Earth Vineyards (GEV) is a first-of-its-kind luxury wine tourism and eco-living community spread across 32 acres in Igatpuri, Nashik. Inspired by the landscapes of Tuscany, the project blends lakefront villas, vineyards, and a working winery with panoramic views of rolling hills, a shimmering lake, and misty valleys. Each eco-designed villa sits amidst your personal vineyard, offering a complete sensory lifestyle: wine-making, farm-to-table dining, and scenic living. Located just two hours from Mumbai via the upcoming Samruddhi Expressway, GEV is more than a home it’s a vineyard-powered lifestyle investment and cultural escape.

properties.title: Goodlife
properties.description: Goodlife is a fully serviced, ultra-luxury gated estate nestled in the lush hills of Karjat, just 1.5 hours from Mumbai. Spread across 8 acres, this boutique community comprises 48 exclusive villa estates designed for nature-inspired, hospitality-centric living. Offering expansive 3, 4, and 5 BHK villas with private pools, landscaped gardens, and premium finishes, Goodlife delivers a timeless blend of elegance, privacy, and resort-grade comfort. Developed by the Holistic Group, the project is built to serve as both a peaceful retreat and a high-value lifestyle investment, surrounded by the region’s top natural and leisure destinations.

location.description: Kothimbe, Karjat is an emerging micro-market prized for plotted developments, boutique farmhouses, and wellness retreats. location.name: Panshet
location.description: Panshet, a hidden gem near Pune, makes an ideal nature‑blended micro‑market for getaway projects. Nestled in the Western Ghats around the Panshet Dam reservoir, it’s a peaceful retreat known for lush greenery, cascading waterfalls, and a charming village atmosphere. The dam and its backwaters are hubs for water activities boating, kayaking, jet‑skiing while nearby hiking and camping spots offer immersive hill‑station experiences. A growing collection of resorts, lakeside villas, and boutique homestays caters to both wellness‑focused travelers and weekenders seeking a serene escape . With its blend of outdoorsy adventure, quiet charm, and easy access from Pune, Panshet is an emerging hotspot for retreat‑oriented development near the city’s main real estate market.

properties.title: Aamby Valley Villa
properties.description: This one-of-a-kind luxury villa is located within the prestigious gated township of Aamby Valley City, Lonavala an elite destination known for its breathtaking views, international-grade infrastructure, and unmatched exclusivity. Spread across a sprawling plot of approximately 23,430 sq. ft. (half an acre), the property also includes an additional 13,570 sq. ft. of organic farming land. With a built-up area of around 5,500 sq. ft., the villa features a spacious covered patio, six elegantly designed bedrooms (five with attached bathrooms and one with a common bath), and a fully integrated luxury layout that balances comfort, privacy, and open-air living. This estate offers a rare opportunity to own a move-in-ready villa in one of India's most iconic luxury townships.

properties.title: Pushpaavan
properties.description: Pushpaavan is a serene, gated farmland estate spread over 125 acres in the scenic hillscape of Panshet near Khadakwasla, just 45 minutes from Pune and under 3 hours from Mumbai. Designed as a nature-forward second home destination, Pushpaavan offers expansive farmland plots starting from 11,000 sq ft, surrounded by rolling hills, forest cover, and valley views. This premium development combines rural charm with modern infrastructure, making it ideal for weekend homes, permaculture farms, or long-term investment. With wide internal roads, a grand entrance, clubhouse amenities, and plot-wise security infrastructure already in place, Pushpaavan ensures a lifestyle of peace, privacy, and long-term value creation. Whether you're seeking a nature retreat or a wealth-building land asset, Pushpaavan delivers both with authenticity and vision.

location.name: Kondgaon
location.description:
Kondgaon is an emerging real estate micro-market located near Karjat in Maharashtra, known for its scenic landscape, lush greenery, and proximity to key tourism hubs like Matheran and Bhimashankar. Once a quiet rural zone, Kondgaon has seen a steady uptick in interest from second-home buyers and eco-resort developers due to its accessibility via the Karjat-Murbad Road and upcoming infrastructure developments in the region. The area offers affordable land rates compared to neighboring micromarkets, making it a preferred destination for plotted developments, weekend homes, and nature-based retreats. Surrounded by forest cover and rich biodiversity, Kondgaon appeals to buyers seeking wellness-focused living or sustainable investments, especially from Mumbai and Pune. With increasing demand and growing visibility through eco-tourism and real estate platforms, Kondgaon is poised to become a high-potential investment pocket in the Karjat region.

location.name: Phuket, Thailand
location.description:
Phuket is Southeast Asia’s leading lifestyle destination, offering global connectivity, tropical luxury, and a mature property market. At its center, Royal Phuket Marina (RPM) stands out as a world-class, low-density waterfront enclave — and Thailand’s only 5-Gold Anchor certified marina. Favoured by global HNWIs for its yachting lifestyle, exclusivity, and proximity to top schools, retail, and healthcare, RPM is a tightly held micro-market with limited inventory. 
The area sees strong capital appreciation, underpinned by sustained demand, and offers attractive rental yields through Phuket’s robust luxury holiday rental ecosystem — making it ideal for both personal use and passive income.

properties.title: Orchid Homes
properties.description: Orchid Homes introduces a three-star hotel-inspired vacation residence concept in Dodamarg, just across the Goa–Maharashtra border and 20 minutes from Mopa International Airport. This low-rise serviced apartment project features fully furnished studios and 1BHKs, professionally managed for optimal comfort, security, and upkeep. Offering panoramic hill and countryside views, state-of-the-art interiors, and amenities such as an infinity pool, clubhouse, rooftop gardens, and shopping centre, Orchid Homes is designed for NRI buyers, investors, and urban families seeking a luxury retreat or passive income. location.name: Dodamarg
location.description: Dodamarg has seen sharp growth as a second-home hotspot after the opening of Mopa International Airport. The scenic township, with green hills and tourism-focused zoning, attracts investors, holiday home buyers, and NRIs. Inventory includes low-rise apartments and luxury villas, with ₹7,500–₹10,000 per sq.ft rates for serviced properties. Demand is driven by proximity to North Goa beaches and upcoming tourism infrastructure, supporting short-term rental and holiday stay markets. The area is also sought after for its low density, fresh air, and seamless access to both Maharashtra and Goa amenities.

location.name: Wada
location.description: Wada, situated in Palghar district, is an emerging micro-market gaining traction for farmland, plotted, and second-home investments. Known for its lush greenery, riverside landscapes, and tranquil environment, Wada appeals to buyers seeking a rural lifestyle within reach of Mumbai. Its strategic location near industrial belts like Tarapur MIDC and upcoming infrastructure developments are gradually enhancing connectivity and economic prospects. With affordable land prices and growing interest in sustainable living and agro-retreats, Wada offers early-mover advantages for long-term, nature-centric real estate investment.

properties.title: Waterscape Phase 3
properties.description: Waterscape is an expansive, nature-inspired development offering premium farm plots and farm villas overlooking the serene backwaters of Panshet, nestled in the village of Pole, Velhe, Pune. Spanning over multiple phases across 115+ acres, the project offers a range of water-touch, water-view, mountain-view, and forest-view plots along with ready-to-build and prefab villa options. Designed to harmonize with the lush surroundings and pristine waterbodies, it is ideal for those seeking a countryside retreat, wellness living, or a sustainable investment.

properties.title: Siri
properties.description: Siri by Mytan Farms is a 45-acre managed farmland project developed by IIM alumni, located in the fertile Penukonda corridor near Bangalore. The enclave features 116 legally compliant plots (5,000 sq.ft onwards), each offered at ₹120/sq.ft—60–80% below prevailing local market rates. Residents enjoy 3-layer professional farming (Sandalwood, timber, fruit, organic greens), a 1.5-acre club zone with studio rooms, herbal garden, swimming pool, butterfly garden, and weekend guesthouse. Projects come with 20 years of professional maintenance, internal tar roads, plantation, water and electricity, kitchen gardens, play area, 24x7 security/CCTV, and all farm management handled by an expert team. The project is 90 min from Bangalore Airport, near new infrastructure, Penukonda’s industrial zone, and weekend tourism/cultural sites. Hassle-free asset management, flexible plot options, and a community-focused and sustainable lifestyle make it the region’s top value pick.

Low-density inventory, modern amenities, and a healthy climate further drive capital appreciation and rental yields in this fast-growing micro-market.

locations.name: Chikkaballapura, KA
locations.description: Chikkaballapura is emerging as a green-living destination near Bengaluru. Known for its clean air, hill views, and proximity to the Kempegowda Airport, it is a prime location for eco-conscious buyers seeking sustainable land investments, farmstays, and second homes. This micro-market is rapidly gaining traction due to NH44 highway access and weekend tourism opportunities.

locations.name: Nachinola, Goa
locations.description: Nachinola is an emerging gem in North Goa, offering serene living away from the tourist crowds yet conveniently located near popular beaches and attractions. This picturesque village is characterized by its lush green landscapes, traditional Goan houses, and peaceful atmosphere. Investors are increasingly drawn to Nachinola for its perfect balance of tranquility and accessibility. The area is experiencing steady property value appreciation as discerning buyers seek authentic Goan living experiences with modern comforts. Its proximity to popular destinations like Mapusa, Vagator, and Anjuna, while maintaining its unspoiled charm, makes Nachinola an ideal location for holiday homes and long-term investments.

locations.name: Siolim, Goa
locations.description: Siolim is one of North Goa's most desirable second-home destinations, known for its calm environment, lush greenery, and riverside charm. The area is witnessing a steady influx of boutique real estate projects, designer cafes, and sustainable homestays. Its proximity to Morjim, Vagator, and Assagao ensures access to Goa's prime beaches and lifestyle hubs, while still retaining a peaceful, village feel. Connectivity to Mopa Airport (30 km) and Thivim railway station (17 km) enhances its appeal. Gated villas in Siolim have seen steady appreciation of 10–12% annually due to limited supply and rising high-net-worth buyer interest.

locations.name: Nerul, Goa
locations.description: Nerul is one of North Goa's most premium residential micromarkets, known for its lush surroundings, riverfront villas, and proximity to Candolim, Reis Magos, and Panaji. It's rapidly becoming a hotspot for boutique gated developments, especially those catering to the luxury vacation home segment. The area is well connected to the new Mopa Airport, state highways, and the main North Goa tourist belt. With increasing interest from domestic HNIs and NRI buyers, Nerul has seen consistent price appreciation and rental demand. Its strategic location allows residents and guests to enjoy peace and privacy while staying close to high-end restaurants, heritage sites, and beaches.

locations.name: Khidarpur, Delhi
locations.description: Khidarpur is a rural village located in the Tijara tehsil of Alwar district, Rajasthan, India. Situated imately 2 kilometers from Tijara town and about 74 kilometers from the district headquarters in Alwar, the village spans an area of 828 hectares.Khidarpur relies on Tijara for major economic activities.The village's serene environment and proximity to Tijara make it a peaceful rural settlement.

locations.name: Madakkal, KA
locations.description: Madakkal, located just 65 km from Bengaluru, is emerging as a preferred destination for sustainable living and agroforestry. With its proximity to Bengaluru, the region offers easy access to city life while providing a serene, green escape. The area is ideal for those looking for a retreat, an investment in eco-living, or a retirement home in a community-oriented environment.

locations.name: Madikeri, KA
locations.description: Madikeri, the heart of Coorg, is a prime location for second homes and retreats. With its growing popularity as a tourist destination, it offers both a peaceful lifestyle and access to Coorg's rich cultural heritage. The region's natural beauty and demand for luxury properties make it an attractive investment, with proximity to Madikeri's charm and amenities.

locations.name: Kodlipet, KA
locations.description: Kodlipet, a town in Coorg, is known for its scenic views, lush greenery, and proximity to popular tourist attractions like Pushpagiri Trek and Bhoga Nandeeshwara Temple. The area is rapidly gaining traction as a prime destination for holiday homes and resort-style living, making it an attractive location for both vacation homeowners and investors.

locations.name: Yedakadu, TN
locations.description: Yedakadu, also known as Edakadu, is a quaint village nestled in the Nilgiris Hills of Tamil Nadu, imately 26 kilometers from Udhagamandalam (Ooty) and 38 kilometers from Coonoor. Home to around 2,000 residents, the village is renowned for its lush tea plantations and the annual 'Sivarathiri' festival, a vibrant celebration that attracts visitors from across the region. With its serene environment, proximity to major hill stations, and rich cultural heritage, Yedakadu offers a peaceful retreat and holds potential as a destination for eco-tourism and nature-inspired living

locations.name: Mapusa, Goa
locations.description: Mapusa is one of North Goa’s oldest and most culturally rich towns, serving as a commercial hub and a gateway to the coastal belt. The real estate landscape here has transformed in recent years with a surge in gated community projects and modern residences. Buyers are attracted by its central location, close to Anjuna, Siolim, and Calangute. The town offers a perfect blend of traditional Goan charm and contemporary infrastructure. Its well-developed civic amenities, robust public transport, and proximity to the beaches make Mapusa an excellent destination for long-term investment and holiday homes.

locations.name: Channapatna, KA
locations.description: Channapatna, known for its lush greenery and serene environment, is becoming an increasingly sought-after location for both residential and agricultural land investments. With its proximity to Ooty, it offers an ideal escape from the hustle of city life, providing an opportunity to own land in one of the most picturesque areas of Coorg.

locations.name: Calangute, Goa
locations.description: Calangute is one of the most sought-after locations in Goa, attracting tourists and residents alike. Known for its vibrant beach culture, nightlife, and tourist attractions, the area has witnessed a rise in real estate demand, especially for premium vacation homes. The proximity to beaches, restaurants, shopping hubs, and entertainment venues makes it an ideal investment destination for both short-term rental income and long-term capital appreciation.

locations.name: Janakere, Sakleshpur, KA
locations.description: Janakere is a serene hamlet nestled in the lush hills of Sakleshpur, Karnataka, known for its pristine coffee plantations, cool climate, and untouched natural beauty. Its peaceful environment and proximity to major cities like Bengaluru make it an emerging micro-market for holiday homes and sustainable farmland investments. With increasing interest in eco-tourism and agro-living, Janakere offers a perfect balance of tranquility, greenery, and long-term value for investors seeking both personal retreats and nature-based income opportunities.

locations.name: Belagodu, Sakleshpur, KA
locations.description: Belagodu is a scenic and tranquil town in Sakleshpur, Karnataka, offering an attractive investment opportunity for those seeking weekend homes or farmland. It is well-connected to Bengaluru, making it an appealing destination for buyers looking to escape city life. The region is known for its cool climate, green landscapes, and growing tourism, making it ideal for eco-conscious living and agricultural investments.

locations.name: Sakleshpura, KA
locations.description: Sakleshpur is a thriving micromarket offering a combination of scenic beauty, growing eco-tourism, and luxury second-home developments. Its cool climate, proximity to Bengaluru, and increasing tourist inflow make it ideal for holiday homes and rental income opportunities. With coffee estates and new gated villa communities emerging, Sakleshpur is becoming a premium destination for nature-based living and investment.

locations.name: Pavagada, KA
locations.description: Pavagada is gaining popularity for sustainable real estate investment due to its massive solar power infrastructure and fertile land availability. Investors are drawn to the region for its potential in eco-agriculture, renewable energy proximity, and affordable plot sizes with managed services.

locations.name: Gonikoppa, KA
locations.description: Gonikoppa is a scenic, plantation-dotted town in South Coorg with growing interest from eco-conscious investors. With proximity to tourist circuits and nature reserves, the area is ideal for low-density development like Ecopia. The micro-market benefits from improved road connectivity and rising demand for agro-tourism and sustainable living.

locations.name: Bagepalli, Chikkaballapura District, KA
locations.description: Bagepalli is emerging as a top destination for sustainable farmland investments, thanks to its proximity to Bengaluru, availability of fertile land, and increasing interest in weekend retreats. Legacy Phase 2's strategic location along the highway and its eco-tourism focus make it a compelling opportunity for nature lovers and investors alike.

locations.name: Doddaballapura, KA
locations.description: Doddaballapura is a rapidly developing area located near Bengaluru, offering a peaceful escape from the city's hustle. With an increasing demand for luxury holiday homes and residential plots in the vicinity, it is becoming an attractive investment destination. The area is well-connected to major highways, offering easy access to Bengaluru while maintaining its natural charm.

locations.name: Bergai, KA
locations.description: Bergai, nestled in the Krishnagiri region, is emerging as a green investment corridor with affordable fertile land and strong climatic conditions for diverse plantations. The region has excellent water tables and is witnessing increased interest from Bengaluru-based investors seeking nature-centric retreats.

locations.name: Kanakapura, KA
locations.description: Kanakapura, nestled on the southern fringes of Bengaluru, is rapidly transforming into a prime destination for sustainable living and managed farmlands. Surrounded by forest reserves and hillocks, the region boasts clean air, red fertile soil, and natural water bodies—making it ideal for organic farming and eco-tourism. Its proximity to Bannerghatta and the NICE Road ensures convenient access, while infrastructure upgrades and weekend travel demand from South Bengaluru are fueling real estate growth in the area. Kanakapura Road is also seeing increasing interest in low-density layouts, lifestyle farms, and retirement retreats.

locations.name: Ramanagara, KA
locations.description: Ramanagara, known as the "Land of Seven Hills," is a fast-emerging micromarket for sustainable farmland living. Located just off the Bengaluru–Mysuru corridor, this region is dotted with mango orchards, granite hills, and serene valleys, making it ideal for curated eco-retreats like Mango Dew. The area enjoys excellent connectivity via the Bengaluru-Mysuru Expressway and Kanakapura Road, while retaining a peaceful, rural charm. With rising interest from weekend travelers, nature enthusiasts, and investors, Ramanagara offers the perfect balance between proximity to Bengaluru and the tranquility of countryside life.

locations.name: Sathanur, KA
locations.description: Sathanur, located in the Ramanagara district, is an emerging micromarket known for its spiritual significance, natural landscapes, and easy connectivity to South Bengaluru. The area is blessed with red fertile soil, undulating terrain, and a peaceful rural character that makes it ideal for managed farmlands, weekend retreats, and spiritual living. Sathanur benefits from its close proximity to the revered Kabbalamma Temple and is seeing increased investor interest for eco-living and low-density farmland communities. Its location along Kanakapura Road ensures smooth access to city conveniences while offering a deeply immersive natural experience.

locations.name: Santhanapalli, KA
